HEADLINE: SoFi Crypto: Unlocking a New Era of Digital Finance
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld SoFi Crypto: Unlocking a New Era of Digital Finance Are you ready for a significant shift in how you manage your digital assets? U.S. fintech giant SoFi is making waves with ambitious plans to dive deeper into the world of cryptocurrency. SoFi CEO Anthony Noto recently unveiled a comprehensive strategy to expand the company‚Äôs crypto offerings, signaling a bold move that could redefine the landscape of integrated financial services. This isn‚Äôt just about dabbling; it‚Äôs about building a robust ecosystem that includes staking, asset-backed borrowing, and even a proprietary stablecoin. For anyone interested in the evolving synergy between traditional finance and the burgeoning crypto market, SoFi‚Äôs latest venture represents a compelling development worth exploring. The company is not only relaunching its spot trading services by year-end but is also aggressively hiring talent to bolster its crypto division, demonstrating a serious commitment to becoming a major player in this dynamic space. This expansion aims to leverage SoFi‚Äôs unique position, particularly its banking license, to potentially launch a stablecoin under the promising framework of the GENIUS Act, as reported by The Block. This strategic push positions SoFi crypto at the forefront of financial innovation. What‚Äôs Driving SoFi Crypto‚Äôs Ambitious Expansion? SoFi‚Äôs foray into expanded crypto services is driven by a clear vision: to offer a comprehensive, all-in-one financial platform for its members. The company recognizes the growing demand for digital asset services and is positioning itself to meet this need with a suite of sophisticated offerings. Let‚Äôs break down the key components of this exciting expansion: Staking Opportunities: SoFi plans to introduce staking, enabling users to earn passive income by locking up their cryptocurrencies to support network operations and receive rewards. This feature provides a new avenue for long-term crypto holders to grow their portfolios and diversify income streams. Asset-Backed Borrowing: SoFi aims to offer asset-backed borrowing, allowing users to take out loans using their cryptocurrencies as collateral. This provides a flexible financial tool to access funds without selling valuable crypto holdings. Future Stablecoin Launch: Perhaps the most intriguing aspect is the development of SoFi‚Äôs own stablecoin, potentially under the GENIUS Act. This would provide a stable medium for transactions within its ecosystem, leveraging its banking license for regulatory compliance and trust, a critical differentiator in the often-volatile crypto market. Relaunch of Spot Trading: SoFi is set to relaunch its spot trading services by year-end, providing a robust platform for users to directly buy and sell cryptocurrencies. This foundational service is crucial for user adoption and engagement within the SoFi crypto ecosystem. The Strategic Edge: How SoFi‚Äôs Banking License Empowers SoFi Crypto One of SoFi‚Äôs most significant competitive advantages in the crypto space is its national banking charter. Unlike many fintechs or pure-play crypto exchanges, SoFi operates as a regulated bank, giving it a unique position in the evolving digital asset landscape. This isn‚Äôt just a regulatory formality; it‚Äôs a strategic asset that builds trust, reduces risk, and opens doors to services others can‚Äôt easily offer. Here‚Äôs why SoFi‚Äôs banking license is a game-changer for its SoFi crypto ambitions: Enhanced Trust and Security: As a regulated bank, SoFi adheres to stringent compliance and security standards, providing a level of trust and consumer protection that unregulated crypto platforms often struggle to match. Regulatory Clarity for Stablecoins: The potential to launch a stablecoin under the GENIUS Act is directly tied to SoFi‚Äôs banking status. This proposed legislation aims to provide a clear regulatory framework for stablecoin issuers, particularly for banks, reducing regulatory uncertainty and fostering wider adoption. Integrated Financial Services: A banking license allows SoFi to seamlessly integrate crypto services with its existing suite of traditional financial products, creating a holistic financial ecosystem where users can manage their entire financial life within one trusted platform. Access to Traditional Banking Infrastructure: SoFi‚Äôs banking status grants it direct access to traditional banking rails, facilitating smoother and more cost-effective fiat-to-crypto and crypto-to-fiat conversions, which is critical for user convenience. Benefits for SoFi Users: A Holistic Financial Ecosystem with SoFi Crypto For SoFi members, this expansion isn‚Äôt just about new features; it‚Äôs about Unlocking a more comprehensive and integrated financial experience. The planned crypto offerings are designed to complement SoFi‚Äôs existing suite of services, creating a truly all-in-one platform for managing money, investing, and now, engaging with digital assets. Let‚Äôs explore the tangible benefits: Seamless Integration: Manage your ch

HEADLINE: Strategy raises $2.52 billion in its 2025 IPO to buy 21,021 BTC
SUMMARY: Strategy, widely regarded as the leading Bitcoin Treasury Company, announced completion of an IPO that secured roughly $2.52‚ÄØbillion, which it promptly deployed to purchase 21,021‚ÄØbitcoins at a total outlay of about $2.46‚ÄØbillion. According to a press release shared by Business Wire the preferred shares, designated STRC, were priced at $90 apiece and are set to list on the Nasdaq Global Select Market around July‚ÄØ30 under the ticker ‚ÄúSTRC.‚Äù The firm sold 28,011,111‚ÄØshares of its Variable Rate Series‚ÄØA Perpetual Stretch Preferred Stock at $90 per share. This offering ranks as the top U.S. IPO of 2025 to date and stands among the most substantial crypto-related deals in recent memory. Trading for STRC should commence on July‚ÄØ30, 2025. Total capital raised was approximately $2.521‚ÄØbillion. After accounting for underwriting fees, commissions, and transaction expenses, net proceeds amounted to about $2.474‚ÄØbillion. Strategy allocated these funds to acquire 21,021‚ÄØbitcoins at an average of roughly $117,256 each. Strategy expands holdings to 628,791 BTC The move increased its aggregate bitcoin holdings to about 628,791‚ÄØcoins as of July‚ÄØ29, 2025, representing an overall investment of around $46.8‚ÄØbillion and an average cost basis of $73,227 per bitcoin, fees included. This transaction set several benchmarks. At $2.521‚ÄØbillion in gross proceeds, it is 2025‚Äôs leading U.S. IPO by proceeds and the most sizeable perpetual preferred stock issue in the U.S. since 2009. Once trading begins, STRC will become the first exchange‚Äëlisted perpetual preferred security from a Bitcoin Treasury Company to distribute monthly dividends under a board‚Äëdetermined rate policy. It also marks Strategy‚Äôs inaugural short‚Äëduration, income‚Äëoriented offering, broadening options for investors seeking steady income streams. Joint bookrunners on the deal were Morgan Stanley, Barclays, Moelis & Company, and TD‚ÄØSecurities. Co‚Äëmanagers included The Benchmark Company, Clear Street, AmeriVet Securities, Bancroft Capital, Keefe, Bruyette & Woods, and‚ÄØMaxim Group LLC. Strategy‚Äôs STRC offers bond-like stability STRC acts like a short‚Äëterm bond while helping the company buy more Bitcoin. Each share pays a monthly dividend that adds up to about 9% per year, although the board can tweak that rate by a quarter‚Äëpercent up or down each month. To keep the share price near $100, the company sells new shares at $101 when demand is strong, pauses or pulls shares if prices dip below $99, and adjusts the dividend rate as needed. If the market worsens, shares can be sold back at $100; if it improves, the company can repurchase STRC to balance its finances, without issuing any extra common stock. Investors like the steady income and stability of STRC, especially compared with the dilution risk of a typical stock offering. Even with Bitcoin‚Äôs ups and downs, Strategy‚Äôs common shares stay above $406, and its other preferred shares trade around $111, $112, and $0.87. text: Strategy raises $2.52 billion in its 2025 IPO to buy 21,021 BTC. Strategy, widely regarded as the leading Bitcoin Treasury Company, announced completion of an IPO that secured roughly $2.52‚ÄØbillion, which it promptly deployed to purchase 21,021‚ÄØbitcoins at a total outlay of about $2.46‚ÄØbillion. According to a press release shared by Business Wire the preferred shares, designated STRC, were priced at $90 apiece and are set to list on the Nasdaq Global Select Market around July‚ÄØ30 under the ticker ‚ÄúSTRC.‚Äù The firm sold 28,011,111‚ÄØshares of its Variable Rate Series‚ÄØA Perpetual Stretch Preferred Stock at $90 per share. This offering ranks as the top U.S. IPO of 2025 to date and stands among the most substantial crypto-related deals in recent memory. Trading for STRC should commence on July‚ÄØ30, 2025. Total capital raised was approximately $2.521‚ÄØbillion. After accounting for underwriting fees, commissions, and transaction expenses, net proceeds amounted to about $2.474‚ÄØbillion. Strategy allocated these funds to acquire 21,021‚ÄØbitcoins at an average of roughly $117,256 each. Strategy expands holdings to 628,791 BTC The move increased its aggregate bitcoin holdings to about 628,791‚ÄØcoins as of July‚ÄØ29, 2025, representing an overall investment of around $46.8‚ÄØbillion and an average cost basis of $73,227 per bitcoin, fees included. This transaction set several benchmarks. At $2.521‚ÄØbillion in gross proceeds, it is 2025‚Äôs leading U.S. IPO by proceeds and the most sizeable perpetual preferred stock issue in the U.S. since 2009. Once trading begins, STRC will become the first exchange‚Äëlisted perpetual preferred security from a Bitcoin Treasury Company to distribute monthly dividends under a board‚Äëdetermined rate policy. It also marks Strategy‚Äôs inaugural short‚Äëduration, income‚Äëoriented offering, broadening options for investors seeking steady income streams. Joint bookrunners on the deal were Morgan Stanley, Barclays, Moelis & Company, and TD‚ÄØSecurities. Co‚Äëmanagers included The Benchmark Company, Clear Street, AmeriVet Securities, Bancroft Capital, Keefe, Bruyette & Woods, and‚ÄØMaxim Group LLC. Strategy‚Äôs STRC offers bond-like stability STRC acts like a short‚Äëterm bond while helping the company buy more Bitcoin. Each share pays a monthly dividend that adds up to about 9% per year, although the board can tweak that rate by a quarter‚Äëpercent up or down each month. To keep the share price near $100, the company sells new shares at $101 when demand is strong, pauses or pulls shares if prices dip below $99, and adjusts the dividend rate as needed. If the market worsens, shares can be sold back at $100; if it improves, the company can repurchase STRC to balance its finances, without issuing any extra common stock. Investors like the steady income and stability of STRC, especially compared with the dilution risk of a typical stock offering. Even with Bitcoin‚Äôs ups and downs, Strategy‚Äôs common shares stay above $406, and its other preferred shares trade around $111, $112, and $0.87. HEADLINE: Joe Lubin, Co-Founder of Ethereum and Owner of Billions of Dollars Worth of ETH, Discusses the Future of Ethereum
SUMMARY: Speaking on Bloomberg''s The Close program, Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys founder Joe Lubin evaluated Ethereum''s adoption compared to Bitcoin and the future of crypto regulations. Lubin argued that the future of Ethereum is now a reality rather than a dream. Lubin stated that ETH stands out as a ‚Äúproductive and yielding asset.‚Äù Discussing Sharlink Gaming''s corporate treasury strategy, he explained that they accumulate ETH daily and immediately stake or re-stake it, thus capitalizing on the yield potential of decentralized finance. He added that this strategy aims to grow their ETH holdings faster than other Ethereum- or Bitcoin-based projects. Lubin stated that his companies don''t currently use leverage but are considering offering convertible bonds, adding that they aim to maintain a low-risk profile. He expressed confidence that decentralization will grow dramatically over time, and he expects a significant increase in the value of ETH, Bitcoin, and other tokens. Related News: Company That Previously Announced It Would Purchase $200 Million Worth of This Altcoin Announces Additional $500 Million Purchase Comparing Bitcoin''s adoption to ETH, Lubin explained that as currencies depreciate, Bitcoin''s value proposition as a digital gold equivalent has become clearer. In contrast, he noted that Ethereum''s future, which was ‚Äúright before us,‚Äù is now a reality, with financial institutions and businesses embracing the changing trust structure inherent in decentralized protocols. He described ETH as ‚Äúthe ultimate trust commodity‚Äù that will drive economic growth. Finally, Lubin shared his views on the SEC''s digital asset policy, stating that he finds the SEC supportive of decentralized protocol technology despite the technicalities of its recent decisions. He also noted that the increased profitability of the Ethereum ecosystem stems from ETH becoming scalable, affordable, and legally usable in the United States. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Joe Lubin, Co-Founder of Ethereum and Owner of Billions of Dollars Worth of ETH, Discusses the Future of Ethereum

HEADLINE: Strategy Doubles Down: 21,021 Bitcoin Acquired After Record $2.5B IPO for New ‚ÄúStretch‚Äù Stock
SUMMARY: Michael Saylor‚Äôs Bitcoin powerhouse, Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy), has officially closed the largest U.S. IPO of 2025, raising $2.521 billion through the public sale of its newly launched Stretch Preferred Stock (STRC) to acquire 21,021 Bitcoin (BTC) at an average price of $117,256 per coin. Strategy has acquired 21,021 BTC for ~$2.46 billion at ~$117,256 per bitcoin and has achieved BTC Yield of 25.0% YTD 2025. As of 7/29/2025, we hodl 628,791 $BTC acquired for ~$46.08 billion at ~$73,277 per bitcoin. $MSTR $STRK $STRF $STRD $STRC https://t.co/PEQQGfvkYe ‚Äî Michael Saylor (@saylor) July 29, 2025 The historic capital raise was achieved through the sale of 28,011,111 shares of Variable-Rate Series A Perpetual Stretch Preferred Stock at $90 per share, resulting in net proceeds of approximately $2.474 billion after deducting fees. According to Strategy‚Äôs official announcement , STRC is expected to begin trading on the Nasdaq Global Select Market on or about July 30, 2025, under the ticker STRC. Strategy STRC Offering: From $500M Pitch to $2.5B BTC Juggernaut Initially marketed as a $500 million raise just last week , Strategy‚Äôs offering quickly ballooned amid institutional interest. The STRC Series A shares carry a 9% dividend and represent the first U.S. exchange-listed perpetual preferred security issued by a Bitcoin treasury company with a board-determined monthly dividend rate policy. Michael Saylor‚Äôs @MicroStrategy has expanded its preferred equity sale to $2B from $500M to acquire more Bitcoin. #Strategy #Bitcoin #MicroStrategy https://t.co/E0t1v4QWC1 ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 24, 2025 This is also the largest U.S. exchange-listed perpetual preferred stock offering since 2009 and the largest U.S. IPO of 2025, based on gross proceeds. Following this purchase, Strategy now holds 628,791 BTC, acquired at a total cost of $46.8 billion with an average purchase price of $73,227 per BTC, including fees. The firm has consistently led corporate BTC adoption, often issuing new debt or equity to fund continued accumulation. Source: Strategy This latest haul, powered by the Stretch offering, reaffirms Saylor‚Äôs long-term conviction in Bitcoin as ‚Äúdigital property,‚Äù while also introducing a new financial instrument designed to attract income-focused investors to the crypto ecosystem. Between July 14 and July 20, Strategy raised $740.3 million across four classes of securities, including common stock and various preferred shares. These offerings fall under large multibillion-dollar issuance programs, some authorized for as much as $21 billion per class, showing Saylor‚Äôs continued ability to systematically convert equity into long-term Bitcoin reserves at an institutional scale. The post Strategy Doubles Down: 21,021 Bitcoin Acquired After Record $2.5B IPO for New ‚ÄúStretch‚Äù Stock appeared first on Cryptonews .

HEADLINE: CNBC Spotlights XRP: Hundreds of Millions Have Poured In
SUMMARY: XRP is making waves once again, this time in the institutional investment world. In a recent CNBC segment shared by crypto commentator Xaif, the spotlight turned to XRP‚Äôs growing popularity among fund managers and investors. Sal Gilbertie, President and CEO of 2Cream Trading, revealed that a newly launched leveraged XRP derivatives fund has attracted ‚Äúhundreds of millions of dollars,‚Äù making it the most successful fund in the company‚Äôs 16-year history. Speaking with CNBC‚Äôs Dom Chiu, Gilbertie explained that while 2Cream Trading has traditionally focused on agricultural-based ETFs, the firm pivoted into crypto after witnessing the unmatched momentum behind XRP. ‚ÄúThey call it the XRP Army,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúAnd I see why.‚Äù CNBC SPOTLIGHT ON $XRP ‚ÄúHundreds of MILLIONS have poured in ‚Äî our most successful fund ever. They call it the XRP Army‚Ä¶ and I see why.‚Äù ‚ÄúWe saw the opportunity and went all-in on XRP derivatives!‚Äù $XRP isn‚Äôt just a coin ‚Äî it‚Äôs a movement. pic.twitter.com/rJxjgP6c7M ‚Äî Xaif Crypto | (@Xaif_Crypto) July 29, 2025 A Record-Breaking XRP Fund Launched just 16 weeks ago, the fund, traded under the ticker XXRP, offers leveraged exposure to XRP through derivatives, rather than holding the asset directly. According to Gilbertie, the product immediately took off, drawing an unprecedented level of investor demand. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve never seen a response like that,‚Äù he said, noting the scale and speed of capital inflows. While crypto ETFs have largely focused on Bitcoin and Ethereum, this fund marks a significant expansion into alternative digital assets. Gilbertie, an open XRP enthusiast, said the company had previously filed for a Bitcoin product but chose XRP derivatives for this initiative due to its strong use case and devoted community. ‚ÄúOur investors wanted leverage,‚Äù he added. ‚ÄúWe delivered a vehicle that gives them access to XRP in a way that fits their strategy.‚Äù Institutional Interest and Market Confidence This development comes amid rising institutional confidence in XRP, even as regulatory uncertainties linger. Despite Ripple‚Äôs ongoing legal skirmishes with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), the fund‚Äôs overwhelming success signals that many investors are betting on XRP‚Äôs long-term viability and real-world utility, particularly in global payments. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Gilbertie likened today‚Äôs crypto market to the early days of the internet. ‚ÄúThis is the internet in the 1990s,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúA sea change is coming.‚Äù Rather than trying to guess the ‚Äúnext big coin,‚Äù he urged investors to pay attention to how blockchain technology is transforming entire industries. A Defining Moment for XRP The CNBC feature could not have come at a more symbolic time, with a growing number of institutions pouring into XRP-focused financial products, the token is shedding its speculative reputation and stepping into a new role as a serious player in modern finance. Xaif‚Äôs viral post brought even more attention to the broadcast, celebrating the milestone as proof that XRP is ‚Äúnot just a coin, it‚Äôs a movement.‚Äù As regulatory clarity inches closer and financial innovation accelerates, XRP‚Äôs expanding footprint in the ETF world may just be the beginning of a much larger shift. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. HEADLINE: BitMine Immersion Launches $1 Billion Stock Repurchase Program
SUMMARY: BitMine Immersion Technologies, which has transitioned from Bitcoin (BTC) mining to focusing on Ethereum (ETH), is launching a stock buyback program. According to a press release , the company plans to buy back up to $1 billion of its outstanding common stock. BitMine Holds Over 600K Ethereum As of July 28, BitMine has 121,739,533 common shares available, and each share has a net asset value (NAV) of $22.76 based on its cash and crypto assets. Notably, the company can repurchase shares as needed through the market or private transactions, depending on market conditions and other factors. Meanwhile, BitMine‚Äôs buyback program is supported by its strong financial position. The company now owns 625,000 ETH, which is worth about $2.4 billion, and 192 BTC, valued at around $22.8 million. The program aims to reduce the number of shares available, which could lead to higher earnings per share (EPS) and better valuation. This decision is appealing to investors looking for value in the crypto sector. It shows that BitMine is committed to managing its capital wisely and strengthens trust in the company‚Äôs long-term vision. BitMine Immersion Aims for 5% Supply Control Recently, BitMine purchased over $2 billion worth of ETH within 16 days. Interestingly, this purchase made it the largest corporate holder of ETH among newly formed Ether treasury companies. Tom Lee, managing partner at FundStrat and chairman of the company, confirmed that the firm is ‚Äúwell on our way to achieving our goal of acquiring and staking 5% of the overall ETH supply.‚Äù With Ether‚Äôs current circulating supply, this target equates to almost 6 million ETH, valued at approximately $22 billion at current market prices. Furthermore, BitMine‚Äôs bold move signals a growing institutional appetite for Ethereum . It also mirrors Michael Saylor‚Äôs Bitcoin accumulation strategy, but on a larger scale, if the company‚Äôs ambitions are fulfilled. BitMine‚Äôs Long-Term Plan for Ethereum Leadership BitMine is not just mining cryptocurrency. It has a clear and long-term strategy. The company aims to establish one of the most extensive Ethereum holdings in the world by acquiring 5% of the total ETH supply. This goal gives the company a strong position and continues to attract institutional investors, such as Cathie Wood‚Äôs Ark Invest , as the market evolves. Other companies, such as Bit Digital and SharpLink Gaming, are also adding ETH to their balance sheets . Together, they are helping to change how Ethereum is seen, not just as a currency, but as a valuable asset for long-term growth. The post BitMine Immersion Launches $1 Billion Stock Repurchase Program appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Ain‚Äôt ‚ÄòBetter‚Äô, ADA Is, Cardano Founder Says
SUMMARY: Cardano‚Äôs founder Charles Hoskinson says Bitcoin wasn‚Äôt the only story in crypto‚Äôs early days. In the last 12 months, ADA climbed 90%, leaving Bitcoin‚Äôs 70% gain behind. Related Reading: Countdown To August 15: What XRP Investors Need To Know He argues that this gap isn‚Äôt new‚Äîit‚Äôs been widening ever since Cardano switched hundreds of millions of dollars‚Äô worth of BTC into building its own network. Cardano Vs. Bitcoin Returns According to interviews with Blockworks co‚Äëfounder Jason Yanowitz, Cardano‚Äôs early backers traded yen contributions into 108,000 BTC. That stash would be worth about nearly $13 billion today if it had just sat there. Instead, those coins went straight into building Cardano‚Äôs network. Based on reports, ADA‚Äôs market cap now sits at $30 billion‚Äîabout 150% higher than the value of the Bitcoin reserve and roughly 2.8 times as much. Really enjoyed this conversation with @IOHK_Charles We covered a lot: politics, psychedelics, his bison + black hawk, his alien search, Japan‚Äôs influence on Cardano, personal security, and of course‚Ä¶ Why he believes ADA is a better investment than BTC.pic.twitter.com/rB26dLLVpP ‚Äî Yano üü™ (@JasonYanowitz) July 28, 2025 Since launch, ADA has jumped nearly 4,000% from its $0.02 debut in September 2017. Bitcoin has rallied 2,400% from a $4,337 price point in that same stretch. Many investors see those raw numbers and wonder whether they should have picked ADA over BTC from the start. They lay out a clear record of gains. Yet gains aren‚Äôt the full picture. Each network serves a different purpose. Bitcoin leans on being a store of value. Cardano mixes staking, smart contracts and on‚Äëchain governance. Future Growth Prospects Hoskinson isn‚Äôt stopping at history. He predicts Bitcoin could still make a 10√ó move to reach $1 million per coin. ADA, by his math, could expand 100√ó to 1,000√ó. That puts Cardano‚Äôs potential market cap in the $2.8 trillion to $28 trillion range. He points to projects like Midnight, which aims to bring data privacy to blockchains, and to Cardano‚Äôs role as a possible ‚ÄúDeFi layer‚Äù for Bitcoin. Those are the levers he says can drive the next big leg up. That vision carries plenty of risk. Blockchains often launch big ideas that take time‚Äîor never‚Äîfind their footing. And pushing ADA to a multitrillion‚Äëdollar valuation would demand major real‚Äëworld use, plus a flood of new users and developers. Even a 100√ó gain would redraw the charts, let alone 1,000√ó. Related Reading: Bitcoin Is A Lifeline, Says Billionaire, As US Faces Debt Time Bomb A Balanced Take ADA‚Äôs run has been impressive. It‚Äôs clear that building a living network, rather than simply holding coins, can pay off. But calling ADA ‚Äúsignificantly better‚Äù than BTC turns on much more than past returns. It hinges on successful rollouts, deep user engagement, and fresh use cases that catch fire. Whether Cardano will rewrite blockchain history remains to be seen. For now, investors can look at the numbers, weigh the risks, and decide if they want a piece of a project that bets on being more than just money. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from TradingView

HEADLINE: US Government Looking To Claim $2,400,000 in Bitcoin (BTC) Seized From Hackers by FBI
SUMMARY: The United States (US) government is seeking to claim $2,400,000 in stolen crypto previously recovered by the Dallas FBI. Five days ago, the US filed a civil complaint in the Northern District of Texas to claim over $2,400,000 in stolen Bitcoin ( BTC ) funds seized by the Dallas FBI earlier this year from a ransomware group known as ‚ÄòHors.‚Äô Says the DOJ, ‚ÄúAs alleged in the complaint, 20.2891382 BTC was seized from cryptocurrency address bc1q5d8af0crjhlnepjq08muhh55899rf2ktye3sxd on April 15, 2025. The seized cryptocurrency, now valued at over $2.4 million, allegedly constitutes property involved in unlawful activity, or proceeds of or property derived from unlawful activity, including money laundering and extortion related to damage to a protected computer, commonly referred to as a ransomware attack. The seized cryptocurrency was traced to a cryptocurrency address allegedly associated with a member of the Chaos ransomware group, known as ‚ÄòHors,‚Äô which has been tied to ransomware attacks against victims located in the Northern District of Texas and elsewhere. The complaint is filed under Case No. 3:25-CV-01920-K. Dallas FBI executed the cryptocurrency seizure.‚Äù The seizure lends credence to the proposed Strategic Bitcoin Reserve concept floated by the Trump Administration. Earlier this year, Executive Director of the Presidential Council of Advisors on Digital Assets Bo Hines said the US government was looking at various ways to accumulate more BTC. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre looking at many creative ways, whether it be from tariffs. Whether it be from something else. I mean there‚Äôs literally countless ways in which you can do this‚Ä¶ Everything‚Äôs on the table and like we‚Äôve said, we want as much [BTC] as we can get, so we‚Äôre going to make sure that no stone is unturned.‚Äù Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Don''t Miss a Beat ‚Äì Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. HEADLINE: Why TRON Latest $1B USDT Mint May Be Its Most Strategic Yet
SUMMARY: Tron continues to dominate the stablecoin landscape, with another $1 billion in USDT minted just yesterday‚Äîbringing the total minted on the network in 2025 to a staggering $23 billion. This marks the strongest year for USDT supply expansion on Tron since the peak of the 2021 cycle. With this latest mint, the total USDT supply on Tron now stands at $81.7 billion, further solidifying its position as the leading blockchain for Tether issuance. Historically, large-scale USDT mints have been viewed as bullish signals for the broader crypto market. These events often precede periods of increased liquidity, signaling that traders and institutions are preparing fresh capital for strategic deployment. As USDT acts as a primary on-ramp into crypto markets, its expansion is closely watched as a proxy for incoming demand. The timing of this mint is especially important, coming as Bitcoin consolidates near all-time highs and altcoins show growing volatility. With capital ready on the sidelines, many analysts believe the market could be on the verge of another expansion phase. If history is any guide, Tron‚Äôs latest $1B mint may mark the beginning of a new wave of inflows across the digital asset ecosystem. Tron‚Äôs $1B USDT Mint Signals Bold Shift Toward Financial Integration Top analyst Darkfost suggests that Tron‚Äôs latest $1 billion USDT mint is unlike previous ones‚Äîand could mark a turning point for the ecosystem. Unlike standard mints, this $1B issuance has not yet appeared on-chain. According to the transaction hash, the funds were transferred to a multisig wallet, where they remain inactive, pending further authorization. No transaction fees were paid, a strong indicator that this is an inventory replenishment mint authorized by Tether but not yet put into circulation. For now, it doesn‚Äôt reflect in on-chain supply metrics, but the intent behind it carries deeper implications. What makes this mint especially significant is its timing. It comes just days after Tron.inc was listed on Nasdaq and shortly after Justin Sun confirmed the submission of an S-3 filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). That filing includes the proposed issuance of hybrid securities totaling exactly $1 billion‚Äîthe same amount as the mint. These securities could take the form of common stock, preferred shares, or debt instruments. The overlap in timing and value suggests a coordinated strategy: Tron may be preparing to intertwine traditional financial instruments with stablecoins in a capital-efficient, compliant structure. If true, this would be a precedent-setting move for the crypto space, positioning Tron not just as a blockchain for transfers but as a fully integrated financial platform. This mint, though not yet live on-chain, may be the first step in a broader vision that bridges TradFi and DeFi‚Äîleveraging stablecoin liquidity as a tool for regulated fundraising and capital management. For Tron, this could be the most significant development since its inception. TRON Breaks Higher As Weekly Chart Signals Bullish Continuation TRX is showing strong bullish momentum on the weekly chart, currently trading at $0.3476 after gaining 8.66% in the last session. This move pushes TRX to its highest weekly close since early 2022, breaking past local resistance levels and approaching its cycle high. The price action reflects a well-structured uptrend that began in early 2023, supported by rising volume and a clear series of higher highs and higher lows. The 50-week SMA ($0.2330), 100-week SMA ($0.1735), and 200-week SMA ($0.1220) are all trending upward and now lie far below the current price‚Äîconfirming the strength and maturity of the trend. TRX remains firmly above all major support zones, with no immediate signs of exhaustion on the chart. If TRX sustains above the $0.32‚Äì$0.34 range, the next major resistance could come near $0.40. A clean weekly close above current levels would likely open the door to further upside in Q3, especially if broader market conditions remain favorable. Featured image from Dall-E, chart from TradingView

HEADLINE: Market Set to Surge as PayPal Introduces ‚ÄòPay with Crypto‚Äô Feature for 100+ Tokens
SUMMARY: PayPal has officially rolled out its ‚ÄúPay with Crypto‚Äù feature, allowing U.S.-based merchants to accept payments in over 100 cryptocurrencies.¬†From Bitcoin and Ethereum to stablecoins like USDT, USDC, and XRP, the platform aims to streamline international commerce with lower fees and faster settlements. Related Reading: Bitcoin Long-Term Holders Begin Distribution: Mirroring Fall 2024 Cycle Merchants can now accept crypto payments from wallets like MetaMask, Coinbase, Kraken, and Binance, with all transactions instantly converted to either U.S. dollars or PayPal‚Äôs own stablecoin, PYUSD. This means businesses no longer need to manage wallets or worry about crypto price volatility. With a competitive transaction fee of just 0.99%, PayPal is in line to be a more affordable alternative to traditional credit card processing, which often exceeds 2%. Bridging Wallets and Reducing Barriers for Merchants According to PayPal CEO Alex Chriss, this move targets a $3 trillion crypto market and more than 650 million global crypto users. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre removing barriers for global growth,‚Äù Chriss said, emphasizing the feature‚Äôs ability to connect merchants with buyers worldwide. The system provides near-instant fund access and offers merchants up to 4% in annual rewards when they hold PYUSD balances within the platform. This built-in incentive adds an investment dimension to the tool, enhancing business profitability. The launch also aligns with the expansion of PayPal World, a global partnership unifying the world‚Äôs top digital wallets. BTC''s price trends to the upside on the daily chart following a re-test around critical support levels. Source: BTCUSD on Tradingview Crypto Momentum to Meet Real-World Utility The launch of ‚ÄúPay with Crypto‚Äù marks another step in crypto‚Äôs mainstream adoption. With support for 100+ tokens and direct integration with leading wallets, PayPal is simplifying what has long been a complex and expensive process: cross-border payments. As global regulatory adopts crypto, PayPal‚Äôs initiative may serve as a blueprint for how fintech companies can drive innovation while supporting small and mid-sized enterprises in the digital economy. Related Reading: Largest Publicly-Listed BNB Treasury To Launch In The US With $500 Million Raise Whether it‚Äôs a shopper in Guatemala buying from a seller in Oklahoma or a global brand expanding reach, crypto payments via PayPal are set to reimagine global e-commerce. Cover image from ChatGPT, BTCUSD chart from Tradingview

HEADLINE: Unveiling the Crucial White House Crypto Regulatory Report
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Unveiling the Crucial White House Crypto Regulatory Report The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with anticipation as the White House prepares to release a comprehensive crypto regulatory report . This isn‚Äôt just another document; it‚Äôs poised to be a foundational framework for how digital assets will be governed in the United States. Described by The Digital Chamber CEO Cody Carbone as a ‚Äúregulatory Bible,‚Äù this report holds immense significance for investors, innovators, and the broader financial landscape. Its release marks a pivotal moment, aiming to bring clarity and structure to a rapidly evolving sector. What Propelled This Crucial Crypto Regulatory Report ? The genesis of this eagerly awaited report lies in President Biden‚Äôs Executive Order on Ensuring Responsible Development of Digital Assets, signed in March 2022. This strategic move aimed to address the burgeoning digital asset ecosystem, directing various federal agencies to collaborate and produce analyses and recommendations. Executive Mandate: President Biden recognized the rapid growth of digital assets, prompting a whole-of-government approach to understand their implications. Inter-Agency Collaboration: Departments like Treasury, Commerce, Justice, and regulatory bodies (SEC, CFTC, Federal Reserve) synthesized their expertise. Comprehensive Scope: The goal was to cover financial stability, consumer protection, national security, and illicit finance risks. Innovation vs. Regulation: The report seeks to balance fostering responsible innovation with mitigating potential risks. This coordinated effort underscores the U.S. government‚Äôs serious intent to establish a clear stance on digital assets, moving beyond ad-hoc enforcement to a structured policy framework. What Can We Expect from This ‚ÄúRegulatory Bible‚Äù? Cody Carbone‚Äôs ‚Äúregulatory Bible‚Äù description highlights its potential as a definitive guide for federal views on digital asset regulation. The report is expected to be far-reaching, addressing aspects that have largely operated in a gray area. Key areas anticipated: Tax Guidance: Clearer rules on digital asset transactions, holdings, and income, aiming to reduce uncertainty. Updates to Agency Rules: Recommendations for bodies like SEC and CFTC to update or create new rules specific to digital assets, clarifying regulatory purview. Consumer and Investor Protection: Measures to safeguard individuals from fraud and market manipulation, including stablecoins and DeFi. Financial Stability Concerns: Assessment of digital assets‚Äô impact on the financial system and recommendations to mitigate systemic risks. Combating Illicit Finance: Strategies to prevent crypto use for money laundering and other illicit activities, likely involving enhanced AML/CFT frameworks. U.S. Competitiveness: Recommendations for maintaining U.S. leadership in financial innovation while ensuring responsible development. The report is not expected to introduce new laws immediately, but rather to lay groundwork for future legislation and agency actions, serving as a roadmap for policymakers. Will a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Make the Cut in the Crypto Regulatory Report ? Earlier discussions included a strategic Bitcoin reserve, akin to gold reserves, to bolster national security. However, sources suggest this may not appear in the final version of the comprehensive crypto regulatory report . This exclusion doesn‚Äôt mean the idea is dead, but it might be deemed too complex or premature for this initial broad policy document. Reasons for potential exclusion: Complexity: Establishing and managing a national Bitcoin reserve involves intricate legal, logistical, and economic considerations. Volatility Concerns: Bitcoin‚Äôs price volatility could be a risk for a national reserve. Political Consensus: Achieving broad consensus on such a novel policy could take more time. Focus on Foundational Issues: This report primarily establishes foundational regulatory principles for the ecosystem, not specific asset acquisition. While a Bitcoin reserve might be on the back burner for this report, its continued discussion highlights digital assets‚Äô evolving strategic importance within government. How Might This Report Impact Your Digital Asset Holdings? The release of this comprehensive crypto regulatory report could significantly impact anyone in the digital asset space. Understanding these potential effects is crucial. Area of Impact Potential Effect Investor Action Market Clarity Reduced uncertainty could lead to increased institutional adoption and stability. Stay informed, consider long-term strategies. Taxation Clearer tax rules might simplify reporting but could also lead to increased tax obligations. text: Unveiling the Crucial White House Crypto Regulatory Report. BitcoinWorld Unveiling the Crucial White House Crypto Regulatory Report The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with anticipation as the White House prepares to release a comprehensive crypto regulatory report . This isn‚Äôt just another document; it‚Äôs poised to be a foundational framework for how digital assets will be governed in the United States. Described by The Digital Chamber CEO Cody Carbone as a ‚Äúregulatory Bible,‚Äù this report holds immense significance for investors, innovators, and the broader financial landscape. Its release marks a pivotal moment, aiming to bring clarity and structure to a rapidly evolving sector. What Propelled This Crucial Crypto Regulatory Report ? The genesis of this eagerly awaited report lies in President Biden‚Äôs Executive Order on Ensuring Responsible Development of Digital Assets, signed in March 2022. This strategic move aimed to address the burgeoning digital asset ecosystem, directing various federal agencies to collaborate and produce analyses and recommendations. Executive Mandate: President Biden recognized the rapid growth of digital assets, prompting a whole-of-government approach to understand their implications. Inter-Agency Collaboration: Departments like Treasury, Commerce, Justice, and regulatory bodies (SEC, CFTC, Federal Reserve) synthesized their expertise. Comprehensive Scope: The goal was to cover financial stability, consumer protection, national security, and illicit finance risks. Innovation vs. Regulation: The report seeks to balance fostering responsible innovation with mitigating potential risks. This coordinated effort underscores the U.S. government‚Äôs serious intent to establish a clear stance on digital assets, moving beyond ad-hoc enforcement to a structured policy framework. What Can We Expect from This ‚ÄúRegulatory Bible‚Äù? Cody Carbone‚Äôs ‚Äúregulatory Bible‚Äù description highlights its potential as a definitive guide for federal views on digital asset regulation. The report is expected to be far-reaching, addressing aspects that have largely operated in a gray area. Key areas anticipated: Tax Guidance: Clearer rules on digital asset transactions, holdings, and income, aiming to reduce uncertainty. Updates to Agency Rules: Recommendations for bodies like SEC and CFTC to update or create new rules specific to digital assets, clarifying regulatory purview. Consumer and Investor Protection: Measures to safeguard individuals from fraud and market manipulation, including stablecoins and DeFi. Financial Stability Concerns: Assessment of digital assets‚Äô impact on the financial system and recommendations to mitigate systemic risks. Combating Illicit Finance: Strategies to prevent crypto use for money laundering and other illicit activities, likely involving enhanced AML/CFT frameworks. U.S. Competitiveness: Recommendations for maintaining U.S. leadership in financial innovation while ensuring responsible development. The report is not expected to introduce new laws immediately, but rather to lay groundwork for future legislation and agency actions, serving as a roadmap for policymakers. Will a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Make the Cut in the Crypto Regulatory Report ? Earlier discussions included a strategic Bitcoin reserve, akin to gold reserves, to bolster national security. However, sources suggest this may not appear in the final version of the comprehensive crypto regulatory report . This exclusion doesn‚Äôt mean the idea is dead, but it might be deemed too complex or premature for this initial broad policy document. Reasons for potential exclusion: Complexity: Establishing and managing a national Bitcoin reserve involves intricate legal, logistical, and economic considerations. Volatility Concerns: Bitcoin‚Äôs price volatility could be a risk for a national reserve. Political Consensus: Achieving broad consensus on such a novel policy could take more time. Focus on Foundational Issues: This report primarily establishes foundational regulatory principles for the ecosystem, not specific asset acquisition. While a Bitcoin reserve might be on the back burner for this report, its continued discussion highlights digital assets‚Äô evolving strategic importance within government. How Might This Report Impact Your Digital Asset Holdings? The release of this comprehensive crypto regulatory report could significantly impact anyone in the digital asset space. Understanding these potential effects is crucial. Area of Impact Potential Effect Investor Action Market Clarity Reduced uncertainty could lead to increased institutional adoption and stability. Stay informed, consider long-term strategies. Taxation Clearer tax rules might simplify reporting but could also lead to increased tax obligations. Consult with a tax professional specializing in crypto. Consumer Protection Enhanced safeguards against scams and fraudulent projects. Be vigilant, research projects thoroughly. Innovation Responsible regulation could foster sustainable growth and legitimate projects. Support compli

HEADLINE: Massive Bitcoin Transfer: Unveiling the $898 Million Coinbase Whale Movement
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Massive Bitcoin Transfer: Unveiling the $898 Million Coinbase Whale Movement In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, certain events capture attention like no other. Recently, the crypto community buzzed with news of a truly significant Bitcoin transfer : a colossal sum of 7,625 BTC, valued at approximately $898 million, moved from Coinbase, one of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges, to an unknown new wallet. This monumental shift, first reported by blockchain tracking service Whale Alert, immediately sparked widespread speculation and discussion across the digital asset landscape. What does such a massive Bitcoin transfer signify, and why does it matter to everyday investors and market observers? What Exactly Happened with This Bitcoin Transfer? On a specific date, Whale Alert, a prominent platform known for tracking large cryptocurrency movements, flagged an extraordinary transaction. The alert detailed the movement of 7,625 Bitcoin from a known Coinbase wallet address to a newly created, unidentifiable wallet. To put this into perspective, $898 million represents a substantial amount, even in the multi-trillion-dollar crypto market. Such a large-scale Bitcoin transfer is not an everyday occurrence and typically indicates significant strategic moves by a major holder, often referred to as a ‚Äòwhale‚Äô. Key details of the event: Amount Transferred: 7,625 BTC Approximate Value: $898 million Origin: Coinbase exchange Destination: Unknown new wallet Reported By: Whale Alert This transaction, while seemingly simple on the surface, carries layers of implications for market dynamics, investor sentiment, and the broader perception of cryptocurrency. Why Does a Massive Bitcoin Transfer Spark So Much Interest? Large Bitcoin transfer events, especially those involving whales, often become focal points for several reasons. Firstly, they represent a significant portion of the total circulating supply moving hands, which can be interpreted as a strong signal regarding market sentiment. Secondly, the anonymity inherent in blockchain transactions, where wallet addresses are public but their owners are not, adds an element of mystery and intrigue. Is it an institution? A high-net-worth individual? A cold storage move? The unknown nature fuels speculation. Furthermore, such transfers can: Indicate potential market shifts: Whales often have deep insights or are reacting to significant market events. Influence investor psychology: Fear, uncertainty, and doubt (FUD) or conversely, optimism, can spread based on interpretations of whale moves. Highlight security practices: Moving large sums off exchanges to private wallets is a common security measure. Who Are Crypto Whales, and What‚Äôs Their Role in a Bitcoin Transfer? In the cryptocurrency ecosystem, ‚Äòwhales‚Äô are individuals or entities holding vast amounts of a particular cryptocurrency, in this case, Bitcoin. Their holdings are so substantial that their buying or selling activities can significantly impact market prices. When a whale executes a large Bitcoin transfer , especially from an exchange to an unknown wallet, it signals a deliberate action that could precede a major market event or simply be a strategic decision for their portfolio management. Their actions are closely watched because: Aspect Description Market Influence Their trades can create significant price volatility. Sentiment Indicator Their movements are often seen as a barometer of market confidence. Information Asymmetry Whales may have access to information or insights not available to the general public. This particular Bitcoin transfer highlights the power and potential impact of these large holders. What Are the Potential Reasons Behind This $898 Million Bitcoin Transfer? While the exact motive behind this colossal Bitcoin transfer remains unknown, several common scenarios could explain such a move: Cold Storage for Security: One of the most common reasons for moving large amounts of crypto off an exchange is to secure them in cold storage (offline wallets). This minimizes the risk of hacks or exchange insolvency. Over-the-Counter (OTC) Deal: The BTC might be intended for a private, over-the-counter sale to an institutional buyer or another large investor, bypassing public exchanges to avoid market disruption. Preparation for Selling: While less likely for a move to an ‚Äòunknown‚Äô wallet if immediate selling is intended on an exchange, it could be a precursor to distributing funds to various exchanges for a large sell-off. Portfolio Rebalancing/Diversification: The whale might be rebalancing their portfolio, potentially moving funds to a new custodian or preparing to allocate capital to other assets. Institutional Custody: A large institution might be moving funds into a new, dedicated custody solution, perhaps after acquiring the BTC. Each of these possibilities carries different implications for the market, making the tracking of this particular Bitcoin transfer so crucial. How Does a La

HEADLINE: XRP Projected Price if It Fully Replicates This 2017 Fractal
SUMMARY: XRP has experienced a strong recovery since late 2024, significantly outperforming many altcoins during this period. Currently trading at approximately $3.12, the asset has risen by over 530% from its November 2024 low of around $0.50. This resurgence has led several market observers to revisit an old theory, that XRP may be replicating the same price pattern it followed during its historic 2017 rally. Analysts Revisit the 2017 Price Structure A growing number of XRP-focused analysts believe the asset‚Äôs recent movements closely resemble its behaviour during the 2017‚Äì2018 bull market. During that previous cycle, XRP started the year with relatively stagnant price action, trading within a symmetrical triangle. It broke out in March 2017 and reached $0.39 by May. After a lengthy consolidation period, the asset surged to its all-time high of $3.31 in early 2018, marking a 60,000% increase from its early breakout price of $0.0055. This pattern appears to be playing out once again, according to some analysts. XRP showed signs of stagnation in the months leading up to November 2024, again trading within a triangular formation. It broke out in November, peaked at $3.40 by January 2025, and has since been consolidating. Now, in mid-2025, the token has resumed its upward movement, prompting speculation that a second major rally could be underway. Prominent market commentators who have highlighted this fractal pattern include EGRAG Crypto , Bassii, Lud , CryptoWZRD, Javon Marks , Charting Guy , and others. While most agree on the general resemblance to 2017, their projected price targets vary significantly due to differing assumptions about market conditions and capital inflows. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Exploring the Implications of a Full Repetition While most analysts lean toward conservative projections, a few have explored what would happen if XRP repeated the full scale of its 2017 rally. Based on historical performance, a 60,000% increase from the $0.50 price recorded in November 2024 would place XRP near the $300 mark, which amounts to over 9,546% increase from the current price of $3.11 Such a scenario would drastically reshape the market. With roughly 60 billion XRP in circulation, a $300 price point would result in a total market capitalization of around $18 trillion. This figure would make XRP one of the most valuable assets globally, competing alongside the market capitalization of gold and vastly exceeding that of Bitcoin and Ethereum combined. Because of these implications, most analysts hesitate to endorse the $300 price level as a realistic short-term target. However, they acknowledge that it serves as a useful theoretical benchmark for understanding the asset‚Äôs upside potential in an unconstrained environment. For investors who entered the market during XRP‚Äôs late 2024 breakout, the possible return on investment under such a rally would be substantial. An individual who acquired 10,000 XRP at $0.50, spending $5,000, would see their holdings valued at $3 million if the token reached $300. While such returns remain speculative, they illustrate the kind of exponential growth that has drawn continued attention to XRP. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. Follow us on Twitter , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post XRP Projected Price if It Fully Replicates This 2017 Fractal appeared first on Times Tabloid .

HEADLINE: Martƒ±‚Äôs Strategic Crypto Investment: Turkish Mobility Giant Allocates 20% Reserves to Bitcoin
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Martƒ±‚Äôs Strategic Crypto Investment: Turkish Mobility Giant Allocates 20% Reserves to Bitcoin In a bold move that has captured the attention of both the technology and cryptocurrency sectors, Martƒ±, Turkey‚Äôs prominent mobility super app, has announced a groundbreaking decision. The company is set to allocate a significant portion of its cash reserves ‚Äì specifically 20% ‚Äì into crypto assets, beginning with Bitcoin. This isn‚Äôt just another headline; it‚Äôs a powerful statement from a major player about the evolving landscape of corporate finance and the increasing legitimacy of digital assets. This Martƒ± crypto investment marks a pivotal moment, signaling a new era for treasury management in a volatile economic climate. Why is Martƒ± Making This Strategic Crypto Investment? The announcement came directly from Oƒüuz Alper √ñktem, the visionary founder of Martƒ±, via a post on X. His explanation was clear and strategic: the move is primarily aimed at preserving the value of the company‚Äôs idle cash. In today‚Äôs economic environment, where inflation can erode the purchasing power of traditional fiat currencies, holding large sums of cash can be a liability rather than an asset. √ñktem emphasized Martƒ±‚Äôs perspective on crypto, particularly Bitcoin, as a long-term store of value. This isn‚Äôt a speculative gamble; it‚Äôs a calculated decision to protect the company‚Äôs financial health. Let‚Äôs break down the core reasons behind this strategic shift: Inflation Hedge: Many traditional currencies are experiencing significant inflation, diminishing the real value of cash holdings. Cryptocurrencies, especially Bitcoin, are increasingly viewed as a hedge against such economic pressures due to their decentralized nature and limited supply. Long-Term Value Preservation: Martƒ± sees Bitcoin not as a short-term trading instrument, but as an asset class capable of maintaining and growing value over extended periods, offering a more robust alternative to traditional cash reserves. Diversification: By adding crypto to its treasury, Martƒ± diversifies its asset portfolio, reducing reliance on a single type of currency or investment. This diversification can enhance financial resilience. Innovation and Forward Thinking: Embracing crypto aligns with Martƒ±‚Äôs identity as an innovative tech company. It demonstrates a willingness to adapt to new financial paradigms and leverage cutting-edge solutions. Crucially, √ñktem also clarified that this Martƒ± crypto investment will not impact the company‚Äôs existing budget or its ambitious plans for expanding its shared ride and other transportation services. This reassures stakeholders that operational growth remains a top priority, with crypto serving as a strategic financial safeguard. The Broader Trend: Corporate Treasury and Crypto Adoption Martƒ± is not operating in a vacuum. Its decision to integrate crypto into its treasury strategy is part of a growing global trend. Over the past few years, a number of prominent corporations have explored or outright adopted Bitcoin and other digital assets for their balance sheets. Companies like MicroStrategy, Tesla, and Square (now Block) have made headlines for their significant crypto holdings, often citing similar reasons to Martƒ±: hedging against inflation, seeking alternative stores of value, and embracing technological innovation. This shift reflects a maturing perspective on cryptocurrencies within the corporate world. What was once dismissed as a niche, volatile asset class is now being seriously considered by finance departments worldwide. The reasons are compelling: Traditional Treasury Challenge Crypto Solution (e.g., Bitcoin) Erosion of value due to inflation Decentralized, limited supply asset (potential inflation hedge) Low returns on traditional cash holdings Potential for significant long-term appreciation Concentration risk in single fiat currency Diversification into a non-correlated asset Inefficiencies in cross-border payments Faster, cheaper global transactions (for operational use cases) The increasing institutional infrastructure supporting crypto, including regulated exchanges, custody solutions, and clearer accounting guidelines, has also made it more feasible for corporations to engage with digital assets. This growing ecosystem reduces some of the historical barriers and risks associated with corporate Martƒ± crypto investment strategies. Navigating the Waters: Benefits and Risks of Martƒ±‚Äôs Crypto Investment While the potential benefits of Martƒ±‚Äôs move are clear, it‚Äôs also important to acknowledge the inherent risks associated with cryptocurrency. The crypto market is renowned for its volatility, with prices capable of experiencing rapid and significant fluctuations. This means that while the value of Martƒ±‚Äôs crypto holdings could increase substantially, there‚Äôs also the risk of considerable depreciation. Potential Benefits: Protection Against Currency Devaluation: Especially relevant in economies prone to high inflation or curren

HEADLINE: ‚ÄòAltseason for TradFi‚Äô Underway As Investors Look To Rotate Profits Into Riskier Bets: Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan
SUMMARY: The chief investment officer of crypto asset management firm Bitwise, Matt Hougan, says traditional finance (TradFi) companies are on the hunt for higher returns in the cryptocurrency space. In a new interview on The Wolf of All Streets, Hougan says that after making ‚Äútons of money‚Äù in Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs), TradFi firms are now seeking alternative opportunities in the industry. ‚ÄúThey made all this money. All this money flowed into Bitcoin. The price went up a 140%. And what are they going to do? They‚Äôre going to rotate into like Kellogg‚Äôs [stock]? No, they‚Äôre going to rotate into Circle and Ethereum and treasury companies. And now ETH treasury companies. And now Solana treasury companies‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs going to go all the way. It‚Äôs altseason in TradFi for sure.‚Äù The Bitwise CIO says the trend of investing in crypto treasury companies is in an early phase. According to Hougan, the trend is only going to accelerate in the coming months. ‚ÄúAnd I know that‚Äôs counter to the media narrative, which feels like we‚Äôre peak bubble, we‚Äôre, you know, March 2000 in the internet. But we‚Äôre not. We‚Äôre 1998. Like, people are still just getting excited. The amount of flow that comes through my inbox is incredible. And if you‚Äôre bullish about crypto generically, why would you think this trend stops? If I think Bitcoin is going to $200,000, do I think this treasury trend increases or decreases? It‚Äôs almost like a self-reinforcing loop until it gets overblown. HEADLINE: Analysts States What $1000 In XRP Could be Worth At the End of Current Cycle
SUMMARY: An independent crypto analyst has suggested that XRP may provide significantly higher returns than Bitcoin in the current market cycle. According to a recent statement by market commentator Common Sense Crypto, a $1,000 investment in XRP today could potentially grow to between $10,000 and $50,000. The analyst shared this projection on X, highlighting it as a key point for investors to consider when evaluating ROI across digital assets. In contrast, he argued that a similar investment in Bitcoin would likely yield much smaller gains, estimating a return of just $1,300 to $1,500. This comparison, he emphasized, demonstrates that current price levels are less important than growth potential when assessing investment opportunities in the crypto market. Here''s a quick fact to ponder, if you put $1,000 into $xrp today you will most likely end up with at least $10,000 ‚Äì $50,000 in this cycle, if you put the same $1,000 into $btc you will most like only end up with $1300 ‚Äì $1500. ROI (return on investment) is more important than‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Common Sense Crypto (@TheCSCrypto) July 12, 2025 XRP vs. Bitcoin: ROI Potential Sparks Debate The analyst‚Äôs comments reflect a growing narrative within the XRP community that XRP has more room for growth due to its lower price and market capitalization. With XRP currently priced around $3.15 and a total market cap of approximately $186 billion, advocates believe it has more upside potential than Bitcoin , which trades at over $120,000 and holds a market cap exceeding $2.3 trillion. This perspective is not new. In June, Alpha Lions Academy founder Edoardo Farina also noted that XRP has historically offered higher returns in shorter timeframes compared to Bitcoin. Farina pointed to XRP‚Äôs surge from $0.50 in November 2024 to $3.40 by January 2025, a gain of nearly 600%. During the same period, Bitcoin increased from $68,000 to $112,000, translating to a more modest return of around 64%. Using that timeframe as an example, Farina explained that a $50,000 investment in XRP would have grown to $340,000, while the same amount in Bitcoin would have reached just over $82,000. Can XRP Reach $50,000 on a $1,000 Investment? To achieve a $10,000 return from a $1,000 investment in XRP at its current price of $3.15, the token would need to reach $31.85. For a $50,000 return, XRP would have to trade above $159, a level far beyond its all-time high of $3.84 recorded in 2018. Reaching $159 would place XRP‚Äôs market capitalization near $9.5 trillion, surpassing the valuation of many global tech giants and even rivaling national economies. Such a projection aligns with ultra-bullish forecasts from some influencers, including Dustin Layton, who previously suggested that 1,000 XRP could yield $50,000 by 2025. However, these estimates have been widely criticized as unrealistic by more conservative voices in the crypto space. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Experts Urge Caution on Exaggerated Price Targets Skeptics warn that despite XRP‚Äôs recent growth, it has consistently underperformed compared to Bitcoin in long-term recovery metrics. While Bitcoin has doubled its 2017 peak, XRP has yet to surpass its previous all-time high. Responding to Common Sense Crypto‚Äôs outlook, another user, Justin Windheim, dismissed the $159 projection, calling it unrealistic. More measured projections from platforms like Changelly and Telegaon estimate that XRP may not reach $50 until around 2035. Some forecasts for a $150 valuation extend even further, with timelines reaching into the 2040s. While Common Sense Crypto‚Äôs projection has energized parts of the XRP community, broader market analysis suggests a more measured approach. Historical performance and current market dynamics indicate that achieving the high-end targets, such as $159 per XRP, would require unprecedented adoption and global economic shifts. Although XRP may continue to offer competitive returns compared to Bitcoin in the short term, investors are advised to remain cautious and weigh speculative forecasts against fundamental data and realistic growth models. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. Follow us on Twitter , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post Analysts States What $1000 In XRP Could be Worth At the End of Current Cycle appeared first on Times Tabloid .

HEADLINE: Unlocking the Crypto Fear & Greed Index: Navigating Market Euphoria
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Unlocking the Crypto Fear & Greed Index: Navigating Market Euphoria The world of cryptocurrency is often described as a roller coaster, filled with exhilarating highs and stomach-dropping lows. How do we make sense of this constant flux? One of the most insightful tools at our disposal is the Crypto Fear & Greed Index . As of July 30, this crucial indicator, provided by the software development platform Alternative, has climbed to 74, firmly planting itself in the ‚ÄòGreed‚Äô zone. This one-point increase from the previous day highlights a palpable shift in market sentiment, signaling growing optimism among participants. But what exactly does this mean for your crypto journey? Understanding the Crypto Fear & Greed Index At its core, the Crypto Fear & Greed Index is a barometer for market sentiment. It ranges from 0 to 100, with 0 signifying ‚ÄòExtreme Fear‚Äô and 100 representing ‚ÄòExtreme Greed.‚Äô Think of it as a psychological snapshot of the market, helping investors gauge whether the collective mood is one of panic-driven selling or enthusiastic buying. 0-24: Extreme Fear ‚Äì This often indicates oversold markets and potential buying opportunities for brave investors. 25-49: Fear ‚Äì Investors are worried, but not in a full panic. Caution prevails. 50-74: Greed ‚Äì A positive sentiment, often associated with rising prices and increased buying interest. 75-100: Extreme Greed ‚Äì The market is likely overbought, fueled by FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out), and potentially ripe for a correction. The index doesn‚Äôt just pull a number out of thin air. It‚Äôs a sophisticated aggregation of six distinct market factors, each contributing a specific weight to the final score. Let‚Äôs delve into these components to truly appreciate the depth of the Crypto Fear & Greed Index . Dissecting the Drivers Behind the Index Score The strength of the Crypto Fear & Greed Index lies in its multi-faceted approach. By combining various indicators, it provides a more holistic view of market psychology than any single metric could offer. Here‚Äôs a closer look at the factors: Volatility and Market Momentum/Volume (25% each) These two factors collectively account for a significant portion of the index. Volatility measures how much Bitcoin‚Äôs price fluctuates relative to its average. High volatility, especially when coupled with falling prices, often signals fear. Conversely, steady, upward movement with low volatility can indicate confidence. Market Momentum/Volume assesses the current trading volume and market momentum compared to average levels. High buying volume on rising prices typically indicates greed, while high selling volume on falling prices points to fear. When the market is surging, and trading volumes are robust, it suggests strong buying interest and a general sense of optimism. Social Media and Surveys (15% each) The crypto community is highly active on social media, making it a rich source of sentiment data. The index analyzes keywords and sentiment from various platforms to gauge the public mood. For instance, a surge in positive mentions of Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies can push the index towards greed. Similarly, an increase in negative or panicky discussions would reflect fear. Historically, Surveys were also a component, directly polling investors for their sentiment. However, it‚Äôs important to note that this specific factor is currently paused, meaning the index relies on the other five components for its calculation. Bitcoin Dominance and Google Trends (10% each) Bitcoin Dominance refers to Bitcoin‚Äôs market capitalization as a percentage of the total cryptocurrency market cap. When Bitcoin dominance rises, it often indicates that investors are moving funds from altcoins back into Bitcoin, typically seen as a safer haven during uncertain times (fear). Conversely, falling Bitcoin dominance, especially during a bull run, suggests investors are taking higher risks on altcoins (greed). Finally, Google Trends provides insight into public interest. The index analyzes search queries related to Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. A spike in searches for terms like ‚ÄúBitcoin price prediction‚Äù or ‚Äúbuy crypto‚Äù can signal rising public interest and potentially, greed. Conversely, searches for ‚Äúis crypto dead?‚Äù might indicate fear. Navigating the ‚ÄòGreed‚Äô Zone: Implications and Risks The current reading of 74 on the Crypto Fear & Greed Index places the market squarely in the ‚ÄòGreed‚Äô zone. While this might sound positive, it comes with its own set of considerations: Increased FOMO: When prices are rising, and sentiment is overwhelmingly positive, many new investors jump in, fearing they‚Äôll miss out on potential gains. This can lead to irrational buying decisions. Potential for Correction: Historically, periods of extreme greed often precede market corrections. When everyone is optimistic, and prices seem to only go up, the market can become overextended, making it vulnerable to sudden pullbacks. Heightened Volatility: While greed drives p

HEADLINE: Ethereum Rally Not Fueled By Bitcoin Dump, On-Chain Signals Show
SUMMARY: Ethereum (ETH) has had an impressive July, surging over 60% from around $2,400 on July 1 to a high of $3,941 by July 27. What‚Äôs particularly notable about this rally is that it appears to be driven by fresh capital inflows ‚Äì not a rotation out of Bitcoin (BTC), as some have suggested. ETH Rally Driven By Fresh Capital According to a CryptoQuant Quicktake post by contributor Carmelo Aleman, claims that ETH‚Äôs current rally is a result of capital rotation from Bitcoin to Ethereum are unfounded. Aleman references on-chain data ‚Äì especially the Bitcoin Realized Cap ‚Äì to explain his analysis. Related Reading: Ethereum Approaches Wyckoff ‚ÄòLiftoff‚Äô Phase ‚Äì Can ETH Reach A New High? For the uninitiated, Bitcoin‚Äôs Realized Cap measures the total value of all BTC in circulation based on the price at which each coin last moved on-chain, rather than the current market price. It provides a more accurate view of actual capital invested in Bitcoin, helping identify accumulation or distribution trends over time. Aleman shared the following chart showing that, as of July 25 at 11 AM UTC, Bitcoin reached a new all-time high (ATH) in Realized Cap at $1.018 trillion. This increase strongly suggests that capital remains flowing into Bitcoin ‚Äì not out of it. In fact, Bitcoin‚Äôs Realized Cap has continued to rise, albeit gradually, even as Ethereum gained bullish momentum. Aleman explains that brief pauses in BTC price action typically align with phases of capital accumulation, which have historically preceded major rallies. Further, Aleman remarked that ETH is simply benefitting from the strong growth prospects of the Ethereum ecosystem. July witnessed a significant surge in interest in the ETH ecosystem, which reflected in the steep rise in price of the digital asset. Ethereum Network Seeing Returning Interest Multiple metrics reinforce the view that new capital is entering the Ethereum ecosystem. For example, data from DefiLlama shows that the Total Value Locked (TVL) in Ethereum‚Äôs decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms has risen significantly ‚Äì from $49 billion on April 29 to $84.6 billion by July 29. Additional on-chain metrics point to a similar trend. According to etherscan.io, daily transactions on the Ethereum network have been climbing steadily, with nearly 1.48 million transactions recorded on July 27 alone. Related Reading: Analyst Forecasts Major Surge For Ethereum Price, Eyeing $4,000 In Its Best July Yet There‚Äôs also growing speculation that Ethereum‚Äôs declining circulating supply is contributing to upward price pressure. Over the past month, ETH reserves on centralized exchanges have dropped by one million coins, supporting the narrative of a developing ‚Äúsupply crunch.‚Äù Adding to that, Ethereum liquid staking recently reached a new record high, with 35.5 million ETH now locked in liquid staking protocols. At press time, ETH trades at $3,772, down 1% in the past 24 hours. Featured image from Unsplash, charts from CryptoQuant, DefiLlama, and TradingView.com
