Aleman references on-chain data ‚Äì especially the Bitcoin Realized Cap ‚Äì to explain his analysis. Related Reading: Ethereum Approaches Wyckoff ‚ÄòLiftoff‚Äô Phase ‚Äì Can ETH Reach A New High? For the uninitiated, Bitcoin‚Äôs Realized Cap measures the total value of all BTC in circulation based on the price at which each coin last moved on-chain, rather than the current market price. It provides a more accurate view of actual capital invested in Bitcoin, helping identify accumulation or distribution trends over time. Aleman shared the following chart showing that, as of July 25 at 11 AM UTC, Bitcoin reached a new all-time high (ATH) in Realized Cap at $1.018 trillion. This increase strongly suggests that capital remains flowing into Bitcoin ‚Äì not out of it. In fact, Bitcoin‚Äôs Realized Cap has continued to rise, albeit gradually, even as Ethereum gained bullish momentum. Aleman explains that brief pauses in BTC price action typically align with phases of capital accumulation, which have historically preceded major rallies. Further, Aleman remarked that ETH is simply benefitting from the strong growth prospects of the Ethereum ecosystem. July witnessed a significant surge in interest in the ETH ecosystem, which reflected in the steep rise in price of the digital asset. Ethereum Network Seeing Returning Interest Multiple metrics reinforce the view that new capital is entering the Ethereum ecosystem. For example, data from DefiLlama shows that the Total Value Locked (TVL) in Ethereum‚Äôs decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms has risen significantly ‚Äì from $49 billion on April 29 to $84.6 billion by July 29. Additional on-chain metrics point to a similar trend. According to etherscan.io, daily transactions on the Ethereum network have been climbing steadily, with nearly 1.48 million transactions recorded on July 27 alone. Related Reading: Analyst Forecasts Major Surge For Ethereum Price, Eyeing $4,000 In Its Best July Yet There‚Äôs also growing speculation that Ethereum‚Äôs declining circulating supply is contributing to upward price pressure. Over the past month, ETH reserves on centralized exchanges have dropped by one million coins, supporting the narrative of a developing ‚Äúsupply crunch.‚Äù Adding to that, Ethereum liquid staking recently reached a new record high, with 35.5 million ETH now locked in liquid staking protocols. At press time, ETH trades at $3,772, down 1% in the past 24 hours. Featured image from Unsplash, charts from CryptoQuant, DefiLlama, and TradingView.com

HEADLINE: Altcoin Season‚Äôs Grip Loosens: Why Bitcoin Dominates the Crypto Market Now
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Altcoin Season‚Äôs Grip Loosens: Why Bitcoin Dominates the Crypto Market Now Are you feeling the shift in the cryptocurrency market? If you‚Äôve been watching your altcoin portfolio closely, you might have noticed that Bitcoin has been stealing the spotlight. The latest data from CoinMarketCap‚Äôs Altcoin Season Index confirms this sentiment, currently sitting at a score of 38. This figure clearly indicates that we are firmly entrenched in what is known as ‚ÄòBitcoin Season.‚Äô But what exactly does this mean for you, and how should you navigate these shifting tides? Understanding the Altcoin Season Index: Your Crypto Compass The Altcoin Season Index is a crucial metric for any cryptocurrency investor. Tracked diligently by CoinMarketCap (CMC), a leading cryptocurrency price data platform, this index provides a clear snapshot of whether the broader crypto market is favoring Bitcoin or the vast array of alternative cryptocurrencies, known as altcoins. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of how it works: What it Tracks: The index meticulously compares the performance of the top 100 cryptocurrencies by market capitalization on CMC over the past 90 days. It specifically excludes stablecoins (like USDT or USDC) and wrapped tokens (like wBTC) to ensure a true reflection of market sentiment towards volatile assets. Defining Altcoin Season: For the market to be officially declared in Altcoin Season , a significant majority‚Äîat least 75%‚Äîof these top 100 altcoins must have outperformed Bitcoin over that 90-day period. This signals a broad-based rally across the altcoin market. Defining Bitcoin Season: Conversely, we enter Bitcoin Season when 25% or fewer of these altcoins manage to outperform Bitcoin. This indicates that Bitcoin is the primary driver of market gains, with altcoins generally lagging behind or even losing value relative to BTC. The Score Range: The index scores range from 1 to 100. A higher score leans towards Altcoin Season, while a lower score indicates Bitcoin Season. The current score of 38, as reported at 00:30 UTC on July 30, down one point from the previous day, firmly places us in Bitcoin Season. Why Are We in Bitcoin Season? Unpacking the Dominance The shift from an altcoin-friendly environment to one dominated by Bitcoin isn‚Äôt arbitrary. Several powerful factors often contribute to Bitcoin‚Äôs resurgence and altcoin underperformance: 1. The Halving Hype and Pre-Halving Accumulation: Historically, Bitcoin‚Äôs halving events, which reduce the supply of new BTC entering the market, tend to precede significant price rallies. Investors often front-run these events, accumulating Bitcoin in anticipation of future gains. This increased demand, coupled with diminishing supply, naturally drives Bitcoin‚Äôs price up, often at a faster rate than altcoins. As the next halving approaches, we often see a ‚Äòflight to quality‚Äô where investors prioritize Bitcoin‚Äôs perceived stability and proven track record over the higher risk, higher reward nature of altcoins. 2. Institutional Inflows and Spot ETFs: A significant driver of Bitcoin‚Äôs recent dominance has been the increasing institutional adoption. The approval and launch of Bitcoin Spot Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) in major markets have opened the floodgates for traditional finance players to gain exposure to Bitcoin without directly holding the asset. These large capital inflows tend to concentrate on Bitcoin due to its liquidity, regulatory clarity (relative to many altcoins), and established infrastructure, further solidifying its market cap and dominance. 3. Macroeconomic Headwinds and Risk Aversion: In periods of global economic uncertainty, high inflation, or rising interest rates, investors across all asset classes tend to become more risk-averse. In the crypto space, Bitcoin is often seen as the relatively safer haven compared to the more volatile and speculative altcoin market. This ‚Äòrisk-off‚Äô sentiment can lead to capital flowing out of altcoins and into Bitcoin, or even out of the crypto market entirely, with Bitcoin often being the last to see significant outflows. 4. Altcoin Specific Underperformance: While Bitcoin shines, many altcoins might be facing their own challenges. These could include project delays, lack of significant development, waning community interest, regulatory crackdowns on specific categories (like DeFi or NFTs), or simply a rotation of capital out of highly speculative assets. Some altcoins may have experienced parabolic runs in previous cycles and are now undergoing significant corrections or consolidation phases. Navigating Bitcoin Season: Strategies for Astute Investors So, with the Altcoin Season Index screaming ‚ÄòBitcoin Season,‚Äô how should you adjust your strategy? This period isn‚Äôt necessarily a time for panic, but rather for strategic re-evaluation. 1. Prioritize Bitcoin and Blue-Chip Altcoins: During Bitcoin Season, it often makes sense to increase your exposure to Bitcoin itself. Its relative stability and consistent performance make it

HEADLINE: SEC approves in-kind redemptions for Bitcoin and Ether ETFs
SUMMARY: The US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has approved in-kind creations and redemptions for two crypto ETPs, which will pave the way for these products to be made available to the public on exchange platforms. The new rule allows investors to exchange real Bitcoin or Ether for shares of the ETF, and vice versa. The shift means that digital asset ETFs will now be on the same operational status as traditional commodity ETPs, adds the SEC, and will further create a more level playing field and an element of consistency across derivative-based investment products. SEC Chairman Paul S. Atkins confirmed the change in his statement on X : ‚ÄúI am pleased the Commission approved these orders permitting in-kind creations and redemptions for a host of crypto asset ETPs. Investors will benefit from these approvals, making these products less costly and more efficient.‚Äù In its press release, Jamie Selway, the SEC‚Äôs Division of Trading and Markets director, echoed similar sentiments. He said the announcement was a positive development for the developing crypto ETP market, as this operational change offers additional flexibility and could mitigate investor costs. The SEC‚Äôs action comes in response to a mounting push from issuers such as BlackRock, Fidelity, and Grayscale, which had lobbied for more traditional fund structures for their spot crypto ETFs. It also comes just days after the agency formally requested public comment on a Nasdaq filing for staking options for BlackRock‚Äôs spot Ethereum ETF, providing further evidence of a move toward regulatory approval of riskier crypto features. SEC revises restrictions and expands options for crypto ETPs The vote on in-kind redemptions was one of several significant regulatory decisions made. The SEC also cleared a new model for trading options for spot Bitcoin ETFs. That includes introducing FLEX options and customizable derivatives, allowing market participants more say in the contract characteristics, including strike price, expiration date, and exercise style. In the most headline-catching move, the SEC raised the position limit for Bitcoin ETF options from 25,000 to 250,000 contracts. The step leads to enhanced liquidity and increased participation by institutional investors in the derivatives segment. In a post on X , Bloomberg ETF analyst Eric Balchunas highlighted what it all means, airing comments from an anonymous ETF issuer who wrote in to say, ‚ÄúThis is huge‚Ä¶ and will create an explosion of option-based Bitcoin ETFs.‚Äù The SEC said that these changes are now effective. The regulator is broadening the accessibility and range of cryptoderivative financial products to build a stronger investment framework for wading into digital assets via fiat-based, orderly markets. Meanwhile, the market‚Äôs evolution indicates a maturing crypto ecosystem in which derivatives products and alternative structures are essential to price discovery, hedging strategies, and market growth. SEC paves the way for altcoin wave with crypto ETPs, analyst predicts Market watchers say the approval indicates a wider strategic pivot toward deeper crypto integration in the traditional financial system. Bloomberg‚Äôs James Seyffart pointed out that by approving in-kind processes on Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, the SEC paves the way to future altcoin ETFs‚Äîsuch as those based on Solana, Avalanche, or Cardano‚Äîto follow suit. In-kind redemption and creation features could be built in for new ETF applications from the beginning, making them more interesting to sophisticated investors and offering the cost-efficient arbitrage and better price tracking they offer. This new attitude comes amid mounting political and institutional support for regulating crypto. The recently enacted Genius Act, which was signed into law by President Donald Trump, brings financial accountability into the 21st century and embraces technology-centric policy. This legislation likely incentivizes the SEC to become more accommodating and creative on digital assets. The in-kind decision also promotes price transparency and makes it easier for ETFs to represent the real-time value of their underlying crypto assets. That‚Äôs a win for investors, who enjoy narrower bid-ask spreads and fewer tracking errors. KEY Difference Wire : the secret tool crypto projects use to get guaranteed media coverage

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Price Prediction: Unlocking the Path to a Massive Rally Later This Year
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Price Prediction: Unlocking the Path to a Massive Rally Later This Year Are you wondering what the future holds for the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency? The latest Bitcoin price prediction from a prominent CryptoQuant analyst suggests a fascinating trajectory for BTC: a brief, manageable pullback followed by a robust rally in the latter half of the year. This insight offers a crucial perspective for investors navigating the volatile crypto landscape. What‚Äôs the Latest Bitcoin Price Prediction from CryptoQuant? According to Crypto Dan, a respected contributor on the analytics platform CryptoQuant, Bitcoin (BTC) is poised for an upward trend as we move into the second half of the year. However, this optimistic long-term outlook comes with a caveat: a projected short-term dip. This isn‚Äôt a cause for alarm, but rather a natural market adjustment, according to Dan‚Äôs analysis. One of the key reasons attributed to this limited downside risk is Bitcoin‚Äôs relatively modest price gains in recent weeks. Unlike periods of parabolic surges that often precede sharp corrections, BTC‚Äôs recent ascent has been more measured, suggesting a healthier, less speculative foundation for its current price action. Understanding Market Overheating: Is a Pullback Imminent for Bitcoin ? Crypto Dan‚Äôs analysis highlights a concept known as ‚Äòmarket overheating.‚Äô This occurs when a significant percentage of investors have recently acquired the asset, indicating a surge in short-term speculation. In the context of Bitcoin, this ‚Äòoverheated‚Äô state is measured by the percentage of investors who have held the flagship cryptocurrency for just one day to one week. When too many participants are short-term holders, it can create a fragile market. These new entrants are often more susceptible to panic selling at the first sign of volatility, leading to quick corrections. Dan notes that the market currently exhibits signs of this short-term overheating. However, it‚Äôs essential to distinguish between different degrees of overheating. Not all periods of heightened short-term interest lead to devastating crashes. The analyst emphasizes that the current overheating scenario is: More moderate: Compared to past cycles, the current level of short-term speculation is not as extreme. Expected to resolve more quickly: This moderation implies that any potential correction will likely be swifter and less severe. Why is This Bitcoin Dip Different? The distinction between the current market state and previous, more significant corrections is crucial. Crypto Dan specifically points to the corrections seen during the periods of March to October 2024 and January to April 2025 as examples of more pronounced overheating cycles. While the exact context of these dates in the analyst‚Äôs historical data is specific to their model, the implication is clear: those periods experienced a higher degree of speculative fervor that required more extensive price adjustments. The current situation, in contrast, suggests a less intense build-up of short-term holders. This means that while a dip might occur, it‚Äôs unlikely to be as prolonged or as deep as those seen during the more extreme ‚Äòoverheating‚Äô phases. This nuanced perspective on market cycles is vital for investors looking beyond daily price fluctuations. Understanding these subtle differences helps investors avoid knee-jerk reactions and instead adopt a more strategic approach to their Bitcoin price prediction and investment decisions. Navigating the Road Ahead: Preparing for the Next Bitcoin Rally If the short-term dip is indeed brief and moderate, what does this mean for the rest of the year? The analyst‚Äôs forecast points to a strong rally in the second half of the year. Several factors could contribute to this potential resurgence: Halving Impact: The Bitcoin halving event, which reduces the supply of new BTC, historically precedes significant bull runs. While its immediate impact isn‚Äôt always felt, its long-term effects on supply-demand dynamics are powerful. Institutional Adoption: Growing interest from institutional investors, including the approval and performance of spot Bitcoin ETFs, continues to bring new capital and legitimacy to the market. Macroeconomic Environment: Potential shifts in global monetary policy, such as interest rate cuts, could make riskier assets like Bitcoin more attractive. Technological Advancements: Continuous development within the Bitcoin ecosystem, including scaling solutions and increased utility, can also drive demand. These underlying fundamentals suggest that even a short-term correction could be seen as a healthy consolidation phase, setting the stage for more sustainable growth later on. For investors, these dips often represent strategic entry points rather than signals for panic. Strategic Insights for Your Bitcoin Holdings Given this Bitcoin price prediction , how can investors best position themselves? Here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed, Not Reac

HEADLINE: Finance Author Warns Of Great Depression Style Crash, Is Bitcoin The Answer?
SUMMARY: Renowned financial educator and author of Rich Dad Poor Dad, Robert Kiyosaki, has issued a strong warning about the state of the US economy. He believes America is dangerously close to repeating the economic devastation of the 1929 crash, raising concerns for anyone whose retirement funds are heavily invested in stocks or bonds. Great Depression Incoming: Echoes Of 1929 In his recent post on the social media platform X, Robert Kiyosaki called attention to what he sees as unsustainable US fiscal policies, warning that America is now ‚Äúthe world‚Äôs biggest debtor nation in history.‚Äù Drawing parallels to the events that led to the Great Depression nearly a century ago, Kiyosaki noted that America‚Äôs printing of money to service its debt has its limits and that those limits are rapidly approaching. He cautioned investors to observe the actions of major financial figures like Warren Buffett and Jim Rogers, both of whom have significantly reduced their exposure to stocks and bonds. Instead, these veteran investors are reportedly now holding mostly cash and silver, seeking safety in these assets rather than stocks and bonds. ‚ÄúIf you do not know why Buffett and Rogers have sold their stocks and bonds you may want to find out,‚Äù he warned . Bitcoin As The Hedge: A Lifeline In A Failing System Amidst these concerns which he noted, Kiyosaki also revealed his own strategy that might get him through another market-wide crash. Particularly, he mentioned that he‚Äôs sticking with gold, silver, and Bitcoin. Gold and silver have long been considered safe havens in times of crisis. From the collapse of the Bretton Woods system to the 2008 financial crisis, they‚Äôve proven themselves reliable stores of value when fiat currencies waver. As such, Kiyosaki‚Äôs inclusion of gold and silver isn‚Äôt surprising. However, Bitcoin‚Äôs entry into the list shifts how even traditional hard-asset advocates now perceive the digital currency. It‚Äôs not the first time Kiyosaki has mentioned BTC as a financial hedge. According to him, Bitcoin will trade at $1 million per coin one day. However, the endorsement of Bitcoin as a financial hedge is more relevant in the context of a potential depression-style collapse. Bitcoin‚Äôs growth over the past two years, in particular, has seen previous questions of speculation change to whether it might be the safest and most accessible asset against inflation. For instance, Bitcoin showed a 10X growth over gold during a short US banking crisis in 2023. Bitcoin has not only set multiple all-time highs over the past year but is currently the best-performing major asset across several economic metrics. According to a more recent report from Russia‚Äôs Central Bank, Bitcoin has outpaced more traditional investments so far in 2025. Particularly, Bitcoin‚Äôs cumulative return since 2022 has outpaced the likes of gold and silver. At the time of writing, Bitcoin is trading at $118,870.

Renowned financial educator and author of Rich Dad Poor Dad, Robert Kiyosaki, has issued a strong warning about the state of the US economy. He believes America is dangerously close to repeating the economic devastation of the 1929 crash, raising concerns for anyone whose retirement funds are heavily invested in stocks or bonds. Great Depression Incoming: Echoes Of 1929 In his recent post on the social media platform X, Robert Kiyosaki called attention to what he sees as unsustainable US fiscal policies, warning that America is now ‚Äúthe world‚Äôs biggest debtor nation in history.‚Äù Drawing parallels to the events that led to the Great Depression nearly a century ago, Kiyosaki noted that America‚Äôs printing of money to service its debt has its limits and that those limits are rapidly approaching. He cautioned investors to observe the actions of major financial figures like Warren Buffett and Jim Rogers, both of whom have significantly reduced their exposure to stocks and bonds. Instead, these veteran investors are reportedly now holding mostly cash and silver, seeking safety in these assets rather than stocks and bonds. ‚ÄúIf you do not know why Buffett and Rogers have sold their stocks and bonds you may want to find out,‚Äù he warned . Bitcoin As The Hedge: A Lifeline In A Failing System Amidst these concerns which he noted, Kiyosaki also revealed his own strategy that might get him through another market-wide crash. Particularly, he mentioned that he‚Äôs sticking with gold, silver, and Bitcoin. Gold and silver have long been considered safe havens in times of crisis. From the collapse of the Bretton Woods system to the 2008 financial crisis, they‚Äôve proven themselves reliable stores of value when fiat currencies waver. As such, Kiyosaki‚Äôs inclusion of gold and silver isn‚Äôt surprising. However, Bitcoin‚Äôs entry into the list shifts how even traditional hard-asset advocates now perceive the digital currency. It‚Äôs not the first time Kiyosaki has mentioned BTC as a financial hedge. According to him, Bitcoin will trade at $1 million per coin one day. However, the endorsement of Bitcoin as a financial hedge is more relevant in the context of a potential depression-style collapse. Bitcoin‚Äôs growth over the past two years, in particular, has seen previous questions of speculation change to whether it might be the safest and most accessible asset against inflation. For instance, Bitcoin showed a 10X growth over gold during a short US banking crisis in 2023. Bitcoin has not only set multiple all-time highs over the past year but is currently the best-performing major asset across several economic metrics. According to a more recent report from Russia‚Äôs Central Bank, Bitcoin has outpaced more traditional investments so far in 2025. Particularly, Bitcoin‚Äôs cumulative return since 2022 has outpaced the likes of gold and silver. At the time of writing, Bitcoin is trading at $118,870.

HEADLINE: Stablecoin Google Searches Hit All-Time High as GENIUS Act Fuels $272B Market Surge
SUMMARY: Global interest in stablecoins has hit unprecedented levels, with Google searches for the term ‚Äústablecoins‚Äù reaching an all-time high in July 2025. Related Reading: Analyst Forecasts Major Surge For Ethereum Price, Eyeing $4,000 In Its Best July Yet This spike follows the recent passage of the Guiding and Empowering Nation‚Äôs Innovation for US Stablecoins (GENIUS) Act on July 18, signaling a pivotal shift in regulatory clarity and institutional confidence in the sector. Google Data: Parabolic Growth and Market Dominance Data from Coingecko shows that the stablecoin market cap now stands at $272 billion, representing roughly 7% of the total cryptocurrency market. U.S. dollar-pegged stablecoins account for about 98% of this total, with Tether maintaining its dominance at 60%. In the meantime, as stablecoin activity increases, the Bitcoin price trends to the upside as seen on the chart below. Bitcoin price trends to the upside as stablecoin activity heats up. Source: BTCUSD on Tradingview Bitwise Asset Management reported record-breaking stablecoin transactions and issuance across 2025, prompting crypto analysts to call the market‚Äôs trajectory ‚Äúparabolic.‚Äù Ethereum-based firm SharpLink summed up the sentiment in a viral post: ‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt spell ‚Äòstablecoins‚Äô without ‚Äòparabolic.''‚Äù GENIUS Act Sparks Institutional Adoption The GENIUS Act, hailed for providing much-needed regulatory structure, has ignited a wave of interest from both retail users and financial institutions. Companies like Interactive Brokers and Robinhood have launched or explored their own stablecoins, aiming to offer 24/7 funding, faster settlements, and increased user engagement. Nassar Al Achkar, Chief Strategy Officer at CoinW exchange, explained that stablecoins are emerging as a ‚Äúhedge against crypto volatility‚Äù and a valuable tool for cross-border payments. ‚ÄúInstitutions are entering the space not just for innovation, but for safer investor options,‚Äù he added. Stablecoins‚Äô Speculation Set to Change to Foundation The surge in search interest, as measured by Google, and market activity shows a significant transformation in how stablecoins are perceived, from speculative digital assets to foundational elements in global finance. Related Reading: Bitcoin Demand Drops Among US Investors‚ÄîIs a Price Correction Coming? While challenges remain, particularly around reserve backing and regulatory harmonization, the GENIUS Act appears to have laid the groundwork for a stablecoin-driven financial future. As adoption continues to rise, according to Google data, stablecoins are increasingly positioned beyond being crypto tools, becoming building blocks of the next generation financial infrastructure. Cover image from Unsplash, chart from Tradingview

HEADLINE: Smart Money Crypto: Strategic Investors Make Massive $9.7 Million Bet on WBTC and ETH
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Smart Money Crypto: Strategic Investors Make Massive $9.7 Million Bet on WBTC and ETH In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, certain moves capture attention more than others. Imagine an investor who not only foresaw but profited significantly from one of the most tumultuous events in crypto history ‚Äì the collapse of Terra and its token LUNA. Now, this very same entity, often dubbed smart money crypto , is making headlines again, this time with a substantial acquisition of Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) and Ethereum (ETH) totaling an impressive $9.765 million. What does this strategic maneuver tell us about the current market landscape, and what lessons can we glean from such seasoned players? Who is this ‚ÄúSmart Money Crypto‚Äù Investor? The investor in question isn‚Äôt a celebrity trader or a well-known institution, but rather a specific on-chain address identified by astute analysts like @ai_9684xtpa on X (formerly Twitter). This address first gained notoriety for its uncanny ability to short Bitcoin (BTC) just before the catastrophic implosion of the Terra-LUNA ecosystem, netting a staggering $5.16 million in profits. Their foresight during such a volatile period cemented their reputation as a true smart money crypto entity, capable of anticipating major market shifts. Their recent activity paints a fascinating picture: over a mere nine hours, this address executed a series of significant purchases. This isn‚Äôt just a random accumulation; it‚Äôs a calculated deployment of capital into two of the most foundational assets in the crypto space. Such rapid, large-scale movements from an address with a proven track record inevitably spark curiosity and discussion across the crypto community. Unpacking the Strategic Moves: Why WBTC and ETH? The choice of assets ‚Äì Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) and Ethereum (ETH) ‚Äì is particularly telling. These aren‚Äôt speculative altcoins but rather the titans of the crypto world, often considered the digital equivalents of blue-chip stocks. The total acquisition stands at $9.765 million, with a detailed breakdown provided by on-chain analysis: Ethereum (ETH): A total of 1,362.8 ETH was acquired. Ethereum is the backbone of the decentralized finance (DeFi) and NFT ecosystems, offering unparalleled utility and a robust development community. Its upcoming upgrades, particularly those enhancing scalability and efficiency, position it for continued growth. Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC): A significant portion of the acquisition involved WBTC, with 643.19 ETH being converted from WBTC. WBTC is an ERC-20 token representing Bitcoin on the Ethereum blockchain, allowing Bitcoin‚Äôs value to be used within Ethereum‚Äôs DeFi applications. The average purchase price for WBTC was approximately $117,993, while ETH was acquired at an average price of $3,757.25. This conversion from WBTC to ETH suggests a potential rebalancing or a strategic shift within their portfolio, possibly to capitalize on Ethereum‚Äôs ecosystem growth or anticipated performance. This focus on established, high-liquidity assets suggests a long-term, fundamental belief in their value proposition rather than a short-term speculative play. It indicates that even after profiting from market downturns, this smart money crypto investor is confident in the foundational strength of these leading cryptocurrencies. The Anatomy of a Smart Money Crypto Play Understanding how this investor operates requires a brief dive into the concepts of shorting and on-chain analysis: What is Shorting? Shorting, or ‚Äúshort selling,‚Äù is an investment strategy where an investor borrows an asset (in this case, Bitcoin) and sells it, expecting its price to fall. If the price does drop, they buy it back at a lower price, return the borrowed asset, and pocket the difference. The investor‚Äôs ability to successfully short BTC right before the Terra-LUNA collapse demonstrated a keen understanding of market fragility and impending volatility. What is On-Chain Analysis? On-chain analysis involves examining data directly from a blockchain‚Äôs public ledger. This includes transaction volumes, active addresses, large wallet movements, and exchange inflows/outflows. By meticulously tracking these data points, analysts can identify patterns and behaviors of significant market participants, often referred to as ‚Äúwhales‚Äù or, in this case, smart money crypto . The transparency of blockchains allows for unprecedented insight into market dynamics that traditional financial markets often lack. The fact that this investor‚Äôs moves are identifiable and tracked highlights the power of on-chain data. It provides a unique window into the strategies of those who consistently make profitable decisions. Navigating Market Signals: What Can We Learn from Smart Money Crypto? While blindly following any single investor is never advisable, the actions of proven smart money crypto can offer valuable insights. Their moves often precede broader market trends or indicate a shift in sentiment among large holde

HEADLINE: Anchorage Digital Bitcoin: The Staggering $1.19 Billion Acquisition That Reshapes Institutional Crypto
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Anchorage Digital Bitcoin: The Staggering $1.19 Billion Acquisition That Reshapes Institutional Crypto In a move that has sent significant ripples across the cryptocurrency landscape, Anchorage Digital, a prominent U.S.-based crypto bank, recently executed a staggering acquisition of Bitcoin. This event isn‚Äôt just another large crypto transaction; it signals a profound shift in how institutional players are engaging with digital assets. The sheer scale and speed of this purchase highlight a growing confidence in the long-term value and utility of Bitcoin within traditional financial frameworks. Let‚Äôs delve into the details of this monumental event and explore its far-reaching implications for the future of finance. What Exactly Happened with Anchorage Digital Bitcoin? According to data shared by blockchain analytics firm Lookonchain on X, Anchorage Digital purchased a total of 10,141 BTC, valued at approximately $1.19 billion at the time of the transactions. What makes this particular acquisition stand out is not just the colossal sum, but the incredibly short timeframe in which it occurred ‚Äì a mere nine hours. This rapid accumulation from multiple wallet addresses suggests a highly coordinated and strategic move by the crypto bank. Anchorage Digital is not just any player in the crypto space. As a federally chartered digital asset bank, it holds a unique position, bridging the gap between traditional finance and the nascent world of cryptocurrencies. Its status as a regulated entity means its actions often carry more weight and set precedents for other institutional investors considering deeper dives into digital assets. This significant Anchorage Digital Bitcoin purchase underscores a calculated strategy, likely driven by strong client demand or a bullish outlook on Bitcoin‚Äôs trajectory. Why This Massive Bitcoin Acquisition Matters for the Market The acquisition of over a billion dollars worth of Bitcoin by a regulated entity like Anchorage Digital sends a powerful message to the global financial markets. It‚Äôs a testament to the increasing institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies, moving beyond speculative interest to strategic asset allocation. Here‚Äôs why this event holds such significance: Validation of Bitcoin as an Institutional Asset: For years, Bitcoin was largely seen as a retail or niche investment. This purchase, however, reinforces its legitimacy as a serious asset class for large-scale financial institutions. It suggests that Bitcoin is increasingly viewed as a viable store of value or even a reserve asset. Bolstering Market Confidence: Such a substantial investment from a regulated bank can instill greater confidence among other institutional players and even retail investors. It signals that established financial entities are not only exploring but actively committing significant capital to the crypto space, potentially reducing perceived risks. Impact on Liquidity and Price Dynamics: While a $1.19 billion purchase is substantial, the market absorbed it relatively smoothly. This demonstrates the increasing depth and liquidity of the Bitcoin market, capable of handling large institutional inflows without extreme volatility. It also hints at a potential long-term upward pressure on Bitcoin‚Äôs price as demand from such entities grows. Setting a Precedent for Future Inflows: Anchorage Digital‚Äôs bold move could encourage other banks, asset managers, and corporate treasuries to accelerate their own crypto strategies. As more institutions seek to diversify portfolios or offer digital asset services, similar large-scale acquisitions could become more common, driving further institutionalization of the crypto market. The Mechanics Behind a Multi-Million Dollar BTC Acquisition Executing a purchase of 10,141 BTC within a nine-hour window is no small feat. It requires sophisticated infrastructure and strategic execution to minimize market impact and ensure security. Institutions like Anchorage Digital typically don‚Äôt buy such large quantities directly on open exchanges, which could lead to significant price slippage. Instead, they often utilize specialized channels: Over-the-Counter (OTC) Desks: These are private trading desks that facilitate large transactions between two parties, often institutions, without going through public order books. OTC desks provide better price execution for large volumes and help maintain market stability. Dark Pools: Similar to traditional finance, crypto dark pools allow institutions to place large orders without revealing their intentions to the broader market, preventing front-running and minimizing price impact. Algorithmic Execution: Advanced trading algorithms are employed to break down large orders into smaller chunks, executing them across various exchanges and OTC desks over time to achieve the best average price and reduce volatility. For Anchorage Digital, a regulated custodian, the acquisition also involves stringent security protocols for storing

BitcoinWorld Anchorage Digital Bitcoin: The Staggering $1.19 Billion Acquisition That Reshapes Institutional Crypto In a move that has sent significant ripples across the cryptocurrency landscape, Anchorage Digital, a prominent U.S.-based crypto bank, recently executed a staggering acquisition of Bitcoin. This event isn‚Äôt just another large crypto transaction; it signals a profound shift in how institutional players are engaging with digital assets. The sheer scale and speed of this purchase highlight a growing confidence in the long-term value and utility of Bitcoin within traditional financial frameworks. Let‚Äôs delve into the details of this monumental event and explore its far-reaching implications for the future of finance. What Exactly Happened with Anchorage Digital Bitcoin? According to data shared by blockchain analytics firm Lookonchain on X, Anchorage Digital purchased a total of 10,141 BTC, valued at approximately $1.19 billion at the time of the transactions. What makes this particular acquisition stand out is not just the colossal sum, but the incredibly short timeframe in which it occurred ‚Äì a mere nine hours. This rapid accumulation from multiple wallet addresses suggests a highly coordinated and strategic move by the crypto bank. Anchorage Digital is not just any player in the crypto space. As a federally chartered digital asset bank, it holds a unique position, bridging the gap between traditional finance and the nascent world of cryptocurrencies. Its status as a regulated entity means its actions often carry more weight and set precedents for other institutional investors considering deeper dives into digital assets. This significant Anchorage Digital Bitcoin purchase underscores a calculated strategy, likely driven by strong client demand or a bullish outlook on Bitcoin‚Äôs trajectory. Why This Massive Bitcoin Acquisition Matters for the Market The acquisition of over a billion dollars worth of Bitcoin by a regulated entity like Anchorage Digital sends a powerful message to the global financial markets. It‚Äôs a testament to the increasing institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies, moving beyond speculative interest to strategic asset allocation. Here‚Äôs why this event holds such significance: Validation of Bitcoin as an Institutional Asset: For years, Bitcoin was largely seen as a retail or niche investment. This purchase, however, reinforces its legitimacy as a serious asset class for large-scale financial institutions. It suggests that Bitcoin is increasingly viewed as a viable store of value or even a reserve asset. Bolstering Market Confidence: Such a substantial investment from a regulated bank can instill greater confidence among other institutional players and even retail investors. It signals that established financial entities are not only exploring but actively committing significant capital to the crypto space, potentially reducing perceived risks. Impact on Liquidity and Price Dynamics: While a $1.19 billion purchase is substantial, the market absorbed it relatively smoothly. This demonstrates the increasing depth and liquidity of the Bitcoin market, capable of handling large institutional inflows without extreme volatility. It also hints at a potential long-term upward pressure on Bitcoin‚Äôs price as demand from such entities grows. Setting a Precedent for Future Inflows: Anchorage Digital‚Äôs bold move could encourage other banks, asset managers, and corporate treasuries to accelerate their own crypto strategies. As more institutions seek to diversify portfolios or offer digital asset services, similar large-scale acquisitions could become more common, driving further institutionalization of the crypto market. The Mechanics Behind a Multi-Million Dollar BTC Acquisition Executing a purchase of 10,141 BTC within a nine-hour window is no small feat. It requires sophisticated infrastructure and strategic execution to minimize market impact and ensure security. Institutions like Anchorage Digital typically don‚Äôt buy such large quantities directly on open exchanges, which could lead to significant price slippage. Instead, they often utilize specialized channels: Over-the-Counter (OTC) Desks: These are private trading desks that facilitate large transactions between two parties, often institutions, without going through public order books. OTC desks provide better price execution for large volumes and help maintain market stability. Dark Pools: Similar to traditional finance, crypto dark pools allow institutions to place large orders without revealing their intentions to the broader market, preventing front-running and minimizing price impact. Algorithmic Execution: Advanced trading algorithms are employed to break down large orders into smaller chunks, executing them across various exchanges and OTC desks over time to achieve the best average price and reduce volatility. HEADLINE: Bitcoin Price Holds Steady ‚Äì Range-Bound Action Dominates Price Chart
SUMMARY: Bitcoin price is still holding the $117,250 support zone. BTC is consolidating and might attempt to clear the $118,600 resistance zone to gain bullish momentum. Bitcoin started a downside correction from the $120,000 zone. The price is trading below $118,500 and the 100 hourly Simple moving average. There is a bearish trend line forming with resistance at $118,600 on the hourly chart of the BTC/USD pair (data feed from Kraken). The pair might start another increase if it clears the $118,600 resistance zone. Bitcoin Price Stays Above Support Bitcoin price started a fresh increase above the $118,000 zone. BTC climbed above the $118,500 and $118,800 resistance levels to move into a positive zone. The bulls were able to push the price above the $119,500 resistance. A high was formed at $119,796 and the pair is now correcting gains. There was a move below the 23.6% Fib retracement level of the upward move from the $114,733 swing low to the $119,796 high. Bitcoin is now trading below $118,500 and the 100 hourly Simple moving average . Immediate resistance on the upside is near the $118,500 level. There is also a bearish trend line forming with resistance at $118,600 on the hourly chart of the BTC/USD pair. The first key resistance is near the $119,250 level. The next resistance could be $119,800. A close above the $119,800 resistance might send the price further higher. In the stated case, the price could rise and test the $120,500 resistance level. Any more gains might send the price toward the $122,500 level. The main target could be $123,200. Downside Break In BTC? If Bitcoin fails to rise above the $118,600 resistance zone, it could start another decline. Immediate support is near the $117,250 level or the 50% Fib retracement level of the upward move from the $114,733 swing low to the $119,796 high. The first major support is near the $116,650 level. The next support is now near the $115,950 zone. Any more losses might send the price toward the $114,500 support in the near term. The main support sits at $113,500, below which BTC might continue to move down. Technical indicators: Hourly MACD ‚Äì The MACD is now losing pace in the bullish zone. Hourly RSI (Relative Strength Index) ‚Äì The RSI for BTC/USD is now below the 50 level. Major Support Levels ‚Äì $117,250, followed by $116,650. Major Resistance Levels ‚Äì $118,600 and $119,800.

HEADLINE: Crypto Fraud: Unveiling the Shocking Sentence of AML Bitcoin Founder
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Crypto Fraud: Unveiling the Shocking Sentence of AML Bitcoin Founder In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrencies, where innovation often outruns regulation, the headlines can sometimes deliver a stark reminder of the risks involved. One such recent development sends a clear message about accountability: Rowland Marcus Andrade, the founder of AML Bitcoin, has been sentenced to a significant seven years in prison. This verdict comes after he was found guilty of defrauding investors of a staggering $10 million and engaging in extensive money laundering activities between 2014 and 2019. This case serves as a crucial warning about the persistent threat of crypto fraud in the digital asset space. What Exactly Happened with AML Bitcoin and its Founder? The story of AML Bitcoin, spearheaded by Rowland Marcus Andrade, is a cautionary tale for anyone navigating the cryptocurrency market. Andrade positioned AML Bitcoin as a revolutionary cryptocurrency, claiming it possessed advanced anti-money laundering (AML) and know-your-customer (KYC) compliance features embedded directly into its blockchain. He painted a picture of a groundbreaking technology poised to transform financial compliance within the crypto sphere, attracting a considerable number of investors eager to be part of what seemed like the next big thing. However, as investigations later revealed, these promises were largely fabricated. Andrade, through his company NAC Foundation, actively promoted the cryptocurrency‚Äôs non-existent technology and vastly exaggerated its business prospects. He leveraged these false claims to solicit investments, convincing individuals that their money would fuel the development of a legitimate, compliant, and highly valuable digital asset. The defrauded funds, totaling $10 million, were not used for the stated purposes but instead funneled through various channels in a complex money laundering scheme. The period between 2014 and 2019 was critical for AML Bitcoin, coinciding with a significant boom in cryptocurrency interest. This environment, unfortunately, also provided fertile ground for deceptive practices, as many new investors lacked the technical understanding or regulatory insights to discern legitimate projects from fraudulent ones. The case highlights how even projects seemingly built around noble concepts like ‚ÄòAML compliance‚Äô can be exploited for illicit gains, underscoring the pervasive nature of crypto fraud . The Anatomy of a Crypto Fraud: How Andrade Deceived Investors Understanding how schemes like AML Bitcoin‚Äôs operate is crucial for investor protection. Andrade‚Äôs deception was multifaceted, relying on a combination of technological misrepresentation and strategic marketing. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of common tactics used in such cases of crypto fraud : Exaggerated Technology Claims: Andrade boasted about AML Bitcoin‚Äôs inherent compliance features, suggesting it was superior to other cryptocurrencies. In reality, the technology was either non-existent or far from what was promised. Fraudsters often use complex jargon and vague whitepapers to mask a lack of substance. False Business Prospects: He promoted partnerships and adoption prospects that never materialized. This creates an illusion of impending success and widespread use, enticing investors with the promise of high returns. Pressure and Urgency: Many fraudulent schemes create a sense of urgency, pressuring investors to commit funds quickly before missing out on a ‚Äòlimited opportunity.‚Äô This prevents thorough due diligence. Lack of Transparency: While claiming to be about ‚ÄòAML,‚Äô the project itself lacked fundamental transparency regarding its operations, financial use of funds, and the actual development progress. Leveraging Hype: During periods of market euphoria, fraudsters capitalize on the ‚ÄòFear Of Missing Out‚Äô (FOMO), where investors might overlook red flags in their eagerness to participate in a perceived boom. These tactics prey on the excitement and sometimes limited understanding of the nascent crypto market. Andrade‚Äôs conviction underscores that law enforcement agencies are increasingly equipped and committed to prosecuting individuals who engage in such deceptive practices, sending a strong message that those who commit crypto fraud will face severe consequences. Lessons Learned: Protecting Yourself from Cryptocurrency Scams The case of AML Bitcoin is a stark reminder that vigilance is paramount in the cryptocurrency space. While the potential for innovation and growth is immense, so too are the opportunities for fraudsters. Here are actionable insights and best practices to safeguard yourself against cryptocurrency fraud : Key Action Why It Matters Do Your Own Research (DYOR) Don‚Äôt rely solely on social media hype or influencer recommendations. Read whitepapers, analyze tokenomics, and understand the project‚Äôs technology and use case. Verify Team Credentials Research the background and experience of the project‚Äôs founders and team memb
TAGS: Crypto News|AML Bitcoin|Crypto Fraud|Cryptocurrency scams|Financial crime|Investor Protection

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Buying Spree Ends On Coinbase: Temporary Pause Or Trend Shift?
SUMMARY: Data shows the Bitcoin Coinbase Premium Gap recently broke its longest ever streak of positive values. Here‚Äôs what this could mean for the market. Bitcoin Coinbase Premium Gap Turned Negative Recently In a new post on X, CryptoQuant community analyst Maartunn has talked about the recent trend in the Bitcoin Coinbase Premium Gap. The ‚ÄúCoinbase Premium Gap‚Äù refers to an indicator that keeps track of the difference between the BTC price listed on Coinbase (USD pair) and that on Binance (USDT pair). The former cryptocurrency exchange is primarily used by US-based investors, especially large institutional entities. The latter, on the other hand, has a global userbase. As such, the Coinbase Premium Gap essentially tells us about how the buying or selling behaviors differ between the American and foreign whales. Related Reading: XRP Dormant Coins On The Move: Reason Behind Price Plunge? When the value of the metric is positive, it means the cryptocurrency is listed for a higher price on Coinbase than Binance. Such a trend implies buying pressure is stronger (or selling pressure is weaker) on the former as compared to the latter. On the other hand, the indicator having a negative value implies Binance is the platform observing a net higher accumulation as its users have pushed BTC to a higher value than on Coinbase. Now, here is a chart that shows the trend in the 30-hour moving average (MA) of the Bitcoin Coinbase Premium Gap over the past year and a half: As displayed in the above graph, the 30-hour MA Bitcoin Coinbase Premium Gap has mostly held a positive value for a while now, indicating that Coinbase users have been buying. This accumulation was so consistent earlier that it managed to reach a streak of 94 days, but recently, a dip into the negative territory finally broke it. ‚ÄúThis was the longest streak in history,‚Äù notes the analyst. Since the start of 2024, US institutional investors have generally played a driving role in the market, with the price often showing correlation to the Coinbase Premium Gap. Given this pattern, a pivot to selling from this group can naturally be a bearish sign for Bitcoin. Related Reading: Ethereum Exchange Reserve Plummets: Over 1 Million ETH Withdrawn The chart shared by Maartunn shows more of a long-term view of the indicator. So, here is another graph, this one from CryptoQuant author IT Tech, that shows how the metric‚Äôs fluctuations have looked on a higher resolution over the past month: From the chart, it‚Äôs apparent that the metric has seen multiple drops into the negative zone recently, with the latest one coming during the past day. ‚ÄúThe demand in the US Market is weakening,‚Äù says the analyst. ‚ÄúCaution is necessary.‚Äù BTC Price Bitcoin has been unable to find a direction as its price is still floating around $117,700. Featured image from Dall-E, CryptoQuant.com, chart from TradingView.com
TAGS: Bitcoin News|bitcoin|Bitcoin buying|Bitcoin Coinbase Premium Gap|btc|BTCUSDT|coinbase

HEADLINE: Here is What 100 XRP Could Be Worth in 2030
SUMMARY: XRP continues to draw major attention as one of the most widely adopted cryptocurrencies by institutions‚Äîand for good reason. As the global economy becomes increasingly digital, XRP‚Äôs role in cross-border transactions has expanded rapidly. Major banks like Santander and SBI are already using Ripple‚Äôs network to settle payments in seconds, while American Express and others explore further integration. This real-world use case sets XRP apart from most other tokens that rely solely on speculation. Adding to the momentum is growing anticipation around a spot XRP ETF. After Ethereum‚Äôs approval earlier this year, XRP is now seen as one of the top candidates for institutional recognition. A spot ETF would mark a major milestone, likely unlocking billions in demand from funds and investors who have previously been sitting on the sidelines. That kind of attention is now spreading to new altcoins, too. One early-stage project, MAGACOIN FINANCE, is being described as a ‚Äú next XRP moment ‚Äù by some analysts. With a projected 13,200% ROI for early backers, MAGACOIN is attracting serious interest from investors hoping to secure a position before it reaches exchanges. Its presale rounds are selling out quickly, signaling that smart money is already moving in. Even a $2,500 investment could grow to over $330,000 if the forecasts play out. Back to XRP, long-term price forecasts are getting increasingly bold. As the global financial system slowly modernizes, XRP‚Äôs position as a bridge currency becomes more valuable. Analysts are starting to model future scenarios where XRP climbs past $20 or even $25 by 2030 ‚Äì especially if Bitcoin hits six figures and the crypto market enters a full adoption phase. That would mean 100 XRP could be worth over $2,500 , turning a modest purchase today into a sizeable return within a few years. The bullish outlook isn‚Äôt just based on speculation. Ripple‚Äôs expanding network of partners, its steady legal progress, and the almost-certain ETF approval combine to make XRP one of the strongest bets for the next decade. While the crypto space remains volatile, XRP‚Äôs real-world utility continues to provide it with solid ground beneath its price action. HEADLINE: US Spot Bitcoin ETFs Witness Remarkable $79.62M Inflow Surge
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld US Spot Bitcoin ETFs Witness Remarkable $79.62M Inflow Surge The world of digital assets is constantly buzzing, and recently, all eyes have been on the remarkable performance of US spot Bitcoin ETFs . On July 29, these investment vehicles once again captured headlines, recording a substantial total net inflow of $79.62 million . This isn‚Äôt just a one-off event; it marks an impressive streak of four consecutive trading days with positive flows, signaling growing investor confidence and sustained interest in Bitcoin exposure through regulated channels. For many in the cryptocurrency community and traditional finance alike, the approval and subsequent performance of US spot Bitcoin ETFs have been a game-changer. These instruments provide a regulated, accessible pathway for institutional and retail investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin‚Äôs price movements without the complexities of direct ownership, such as managing private keys or navigating crypto exchanges. This accessibility has been a significant driver of the recent inflows, as more diverse investor pools look to capitalize on Bitcoin‚Äôs potential. Understanding the Dynamics of US Spot Bitcoin ETFs Inflows The daily inflow and outflow data for US spot Bitcoin ETFs offer a fascinating snapshot of market sentiment and the strategic movements of major players. On July 29, the picture was largely positive, albeit with some interesting nuances: BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT Leads the Charge: BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) continued its dominant performance, pulling in a staggering $157.19 million in inflows. This consistent leadership underscores BlackRock‚Äôs significant market presence and investor trust in their offering. VanEck‚Äôs HODL Sees Modest Gains: VanEck‚Äôs Bitcoin Trust (HODL) also contributed positively, albeit on a smaller scale, with $5.82 million in inflows. This indicates a broader interest beyond just the largest funds. Outflows from Key Players: While the overall trend was positive, some funds experienced outflows. Grayscale‚Äôs Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) saw $48.97 million in outflows, a pattern observed since its conversion from a trust to an ETF. Bitwise‚Äôs Bitcoin ETF (BITB) recorded $26.22 million in outflows, and ARK Invest‚Äôs ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF (ARKB) had $8.2 million in outflows. These outflows often reflect profit-taking, rebalancing of portfolios, or shifts towards lower-fee alternatives. Steady Holdings: The remaining US spot Bitcoin ETFs reported no change in their holdings for the day, suggesting a period of stability for those particular funds. The net positive flow, despite some significant outflows, highlights the robust demand for new capital entering the Bitcoin ETF ecosystem. It‚Äôs a testament to the growing institutional appetite for digital assets, viewing Bitcoin not just as a speculative asset but as a legitimate component of a diversified investment portfolio. Why Are These Inflows into US Spot Bitcoin ETFs So Important? The continuous positive flow into US spot Bitcoin ETFs carries significant implications for the broader cryptocurrency market and traditional finance. Here‚Äôs why: Institutional Validation: The sheer volume of inflows, particularly into funds managed by financial giants like BlackRock, signals increasing institutional validation of Bitcoin as an asset class. This can pave the way for more traditional investors to allocate capital to digital assets. Market Maturation: The presence of regulated ETF products contributes to the maturation of the Bitcoin market. It brings greater transparency, liquidity, and adherence to established financial standards, which can reduce volatility and enhance investor confidence. Price Impact: While not a direct cause-and-effect, sustained inflows into Bitcoin ETFs create demand for underlying Bitcoin. As ETFs acquire more BTC to back their shares, it reduces the available supply on exchanges, potentially exerting upward pressure on Bitcoin‚Äôs price over time. Accessibility and Education: ETFs simplify Bitcoin investment, making it accessible to a wider audience who might be intimidated by direct crypto purchases. This increased accessibility also fosters greater education about digital assets within traditional financial circles. Competitive Landscape: The competition among various ETF providers drives innovation in product offerings, fee structures, and marketing efforts, ultimately benefiting investors. The interplay between these factors creates a powerful feedback loop, where positive inflows reinforce confidence, leading to further interest and investment. The Evolution of Bitcoin Investment: From Retail to Institutional Bitcoin‚Äôs journey from a niche digital currency to a globally recognized asset has been remarkable. Initially, its adoption was primarily driven by tech-savvy individuals and early adopters. However, the introduction of financial products like futures contracts and, more recently, US spot Bitcoin ETFs , has opened the floodgates for institutional capita

HEADLINE: Ethereum Price Poised for a Comeback ‚Äì Is Another Rally on the Horizon?
SUMMARY: Ethereum price struggled to continue higher above the $3,940 zone. ETH is now consolidating gains and might soon aim for a move toward $4,000. Ethereum started a fresh increase above the $3,840 and $3,880 levels. The price is trading above $3,800 and the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average. There is a bearish trend line forming with resistance at $3,840 on the hourly chart of ETH/USD (data feed via Kraken). The pair could start a fresh increase if it remains supported above the $3,725 zone in the near term. Ethereum Price Holds Support Ethereum price struggled to extend gains above the $3,940 level, like Bitcoin . ETH price started a downside correction from the $3,939 high and traded below $3,900. The price traded below the $3,820 support level and settled below the 23.6% Fib retracement level of the upward move from the $3,515 swing low to the $3,939 high. Moreover, there is a bearish trend line forming with resistance at $3,840 on the hourly chart of ETH/USD. However, the price is steady above the $3,720 support and the 50% Fib retracement level of the upward move from the $3,515 swing low to the $3,939 high. Ethereum price is now trading above $3,800 and the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average . On the upside, the price could face resistance near the $3,840 level. The next key resistance is near the $3,880 level. The first major resistance is near the $3,940 level. A clear move above the $3,940 resistance might send the price toward the $3,965 resistance. An upside break above the $3,965 resistance might call for more gains in the coming sessions. In the stated case, Ether could rise toward the $4,000 resistance zone or even $4,120 in the near term. Another Drop In ETH? If Ethereum fails to clear the $3,840 resistance, it could start a downside correction. Initial support on the downside is near the $3,720 level. The first major support sits near the $3,680 zone. A clear move below the $3,680 support might push the price toward the $3,650 support. Any more losses might send the price toward the $3,550 support level in the near term. The next key support sits at $3,420. Technical Indicators Hourly MACD ‚Äì The MACD for ETH/USD is losing momentum in the bullish zone. Hourly RSI ‚Äì The RSI for ETH/USD is now below the 50 zone. Major Support Level ‚Äì $3,720 Major Resistance Level ‚Äì $3,840

HEADLINE: Crypto Perpetual Futures Liquidation: Unveiling the Shocking Truth Behind Market Volatility
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Crypto Perpetual Futures Liquidation: Unveiling the Shocking Truth Behind Market Volatility In the high-stakes arena of cryptocurrency trading, few events strike more fear into the hearts of participants than liquidation . It is the swift, unforgiving mechanism that closes out leveraged positions when a trader‚Äôs margin falls below the required threshold, often leading to substantial losses. Over the last 24 hours, the crypto market has once again witnessed significant instances of crypto perpetual futures liquidation , underscoring the inherent volatility and risks of this popular trading instrument. Understanding these liquidations is not just about observing numbers; it is about grasping the underlying market dynamics and learning crucial lessons in risk management. For many, the world of perpetual futures can seem daunting, a complex web of leverage, margin, and funding rates. Yet, it is a cornerstone of modern crypto trading, offering opportunities for magnified gains, but equally, for magnified losses. When market conditions turn unfavorable, or positions are over-leveraged, the system intervenes, leading to the dreaded liquidation event. Let us dive into the recent 24-hour breakdown and explore what these figures tell us about the current state of the market and the behavior of its participants. Understanding the Mechanics of Crypto Perpetual Futures Liquidation Before we dissect the latest figures, it is crucial to understand what crypto perpetual futures liquidation truly means. Unlike traditional futures contracts that have an expiry date, perpetual futures do not. They are designed to mimic spot market prices through a funding rate mechanism. Traders can open positions with leverage, meaning they can control a large position with a relatively small amount of capital (margin). However, this leverage is a double-edged sword. If the market moves against a leveraged position, the trader‚Äôs equity (margin) begins to deplete. Exchanges set a ‚Äòmaintenance margin‚Äô level. If the value of a trader‚Äôs margin account falls below this level, the exchange automatically closes (liquidates) the position to prevent the account from going into negative equity. This process is often swift and can result in the entire margin being lost. Key factors contributing to liquidation include: High Leverage: The higher the leverage, the smaller the price movement required to trigger liquidation. Volatile Market Swings: Sudden, sharp price movements can quickly push positions past their liquidation price. Insufficient Margin: Not adding more funds to a losing position (margin call) when needed. Poor Risk Management: Failing to use stop-loss orders or manage position sizes effectively. The Shocking 24-Hour Crypto Perpetual Futures Liquidation Breakdown: What the Numbers Reveal The past 24 hours have been a stark reminder of the power of market forces, particularly for those holding leveraged long positions. Here is the breakdown of crypto perpetual futures liquidation across major assets: Cryptocurrency Total Liquidation (24h) Long Position Liquidation Percentage BTC $35.49 million 65.33% ETH $72.66 million 60.76% XRP $12.66 million 75.15% These figures are illuminating. With a staggering $72.66 million in ETH liquidations, Ethereum futures traders bore the brunt of the market‚Äôs recent movements, followed by Bitcoin at $35.49 million and XRP at $12.66 million. What is particularly striking is the high percentage of long positions liquidated across all three assets: 65.33% for BTC, 60.76% for ETH, and a significant 75.15% for XRP. This data strongly suggests that the market experienced a notable downward price action, catching many optimistic long traders off guard. The dominance of long liquidations indicates that a significant portion of traders were betting on price increases, only to see their positions wiped out as prices fell. This often leads to a cascading effect, where initial liquidations further depress prices, triggering more liquidations in a vicious cycle. Why Do Traders Get Liquidated? Common Pitfalls in Crypto Perpetual Futures Trading The high volume of crypto perpetual futures liquidation we just observed is not random; it is a direct consequence of common trading mistakes. Understanding these pitfalls is the first step toward avoiding them: Excessive Leverage: This is arguably the biggest culprit. While 100x leverage might seem enticing for massive gains, it means a mere 1% price movement against your position can lead to liquidation. Many traders overestimate their ability to predict short-term market movements. Ignoring Stop-Loss Orders: A stop-loss is your safety net. It automatically closes your position at a predetermined price, limiting potential losses. Many traders, driven by hope or fear, fail to set stop-losses or move them, leading to devastating outcomes. Lack of Market Analysis: Entering trades without thorough technical and fundamental analysis, or failing to stay updated on market new

HEADLINE: Analyst Says Bitcoin‚Äôs Final Leg Is Near ‚Äì Time To Be ‚ÄòCautiously Optimistic‚Äô?
SUMMARY: As Bitcoin (BTC) continues to trade within its local range, the cryptocurrency eyes a trend continuation, aiming to go on uncharted territory again. Despite the bullish setup, an analyst suggests that investors start to become more cautious as the weeks progress. Related Reading: Injective Targets $25 Amid Crucial Breakout Attempt ‚Äì New Highs In Sight? Bitcoin Bull Flag To Determine Next Move Since the early July breakout, Bitcoin has been trading within a crucial price range, hitting its latest all-time high during this period. The flagship crypto has been hovering between $114,000-$120,000, retesting the local lows on Friday before recovering the range highs over the weekend. Amid this performance, market watcher Crypto Patel highlighted that BTC is trading inside a bull flag formation in the 4H chart, which could lead to an 8%-12% move once broken out. According to the analysis, if the cryptocurrency successfully breaks above the pattern‚Äôs descending resistance, near the $120,000 mark, its price could see a surge toward the $130,000 barrier for the first time. On the contrary, a rejection from this area could send Bitcoin toward the bull flag‚Äôs support, around $114,000, once more. The analyst warned that despite the key support‚Äôs strength, a breakdown below this level would invalidate the bullish pattern and risk a drop to the $100,000 level or below. In a Monday analysis, analyst Rekt Capital also discussed BTC‚Äôs bull flag in the weekly chart. He noted that Bitcoin closed last week above the bull flag top despite the Friday drop, ‚Äúpreparing and positioning itself for a confirmed breakout.‚Äù Therefore, the start-of-week pullback could be considered a volatile post-breakout retest if the cryptocurrency closes this week above $119,200. The analyst explained that ‚Äúprice has an entire week to do that; in fact, price could downside wick below the Bull Flag bottom to form a potential Diamond-Shaped candlestick formation in the downside wicks.‚Äù ‚ÄúIt makes sense why price needs to dip,‚Äù he detailed, ‚Äúit also makes sense for price to dip via the perspective of the newly formed Weekly CME Gap.‚Äù BTC‚Äôs Rally Running Out Of Time? As Daan Crypto Trades pointed out, BTC opened the week with a new CME Gap between $118,297 and $120,035, which was immediately closed on Monday, as the price retraced to the $117,000 mark. Notably, the flagship crypto has been closing its CME Gaps at the start of the week for the past five weeks, ‚Äúbuilding quite the streak at this point.‚Äù To the trader, ‚Äúthe longer this goes on, the more of a self-fulfilling prophecy it will become.‚Äù Rekt Capital also highlighted that Bitcoin has entered Week 4 of its second Price Discovery Uptrend, asserting that if BTC confirms a breakout from the weekly bullish flag, then ‚Äútrend continuation in Price Discovery Uptrend 2 would be achieved.‚Äù Related Reading: Bitcoin‚Äôs Rally Might Be Running on Fumes, Analyst Warns of August Turning Point He warned that the second Uptrend could not last much longer. According to the analyst, the trend continuation could fail in the coming weeks, as the cryptocurrency transitions into the Weeks 5-7 of this phase. It‚Äôs worth noting that this cycle‚Äôs first Price Discovery uptrend lasted around 6-7 weeks before reaching the local top. As a result, he considers it ‚Äúwould be conservative thus to become increasingly cautious as time goes on,‚Äù starting to become ‚Äúcautiously optimistic‚Äù from this week on. As of this writing, Bitcoin is trading at $117,161, a 2.1% decline in the weekly timeframe. Featured Image from Unsplash.com, Chart from TradingView.com
TAGS: Bitcoin|bitcoin|bitcoin analysis|bitcoin breakout|btc|BTC ATH|btc price|BTCUSDT|crypto analyst|Crypto Bull Run 2025|crypto market correction|Crypto trader

The analyst explained that ‚Äúprice has an entire week to do that; in fact, price could downside wick below the Bull Flag bottom to form a potential Diamond-Shaped candlestick formation in the downside wicks.‚Äù ‚ÄúIt makes sense why price needs to dip,‚Äù he detailed, ‚Äúit also makes sense for price to dip via the perspective of the newly formed Weekly CME Gap.‚Äù BTC‚Äôs Rally Running Out Of Time? As Daan Crypto Trades pointed out, BTC opened the week with a new CME Gap between $118,297 and $120,035, which was immediately closed on Monday, as the price retraced to the $117,000 mark. Notably, the flagship crypto has been closing its CME Gaps at the start of the week for the past five weeks, ‚Äúbuilding quite the streak at this point.‚Äù To the trader, ‚Äúthe longer this goes on, the more of a self-fulfilling prophecy it will become.‚Äù Rekt Capital also highlighted that Bitcoin has entered Week 4 of its second Price Discovery Uptrend, asserting that if BTC confirms a breakout from the weekly bullish flag, then ‚Äútrend continuation in Price Discovery Uptrend 2 would be achieved.‚Äù Related Reading: Bitcoin‚Äôs Rally Might Be Running on Fumes, Analyst Warns of August Turning Point He warned that the second Uptrend could not last much longer. According to the analyst, the trend continuation could fail in the coming weeks, as the cryptocurrency transitions into the Weeks 5-7 of this phase. It‚Äôs worth noting that this cycle‚Äôs first Price Discovery uptrend lasted around 6-7 weeks before reaching the local top. As a result, he considers it ‚Äúwould be conservative thus to become increasingly cautious as time goes on,‚Äù starting to become ‚Äúcautiously optimistic‚Äù from this week on. As of this writing, Bitcoin is trading at $117,161, a 2.1% decline in the weekly timeframe. Featured Image from Unsplash.com, Chart from TradingView.com

HEADLINE: XRP Price Starts Recovery Move ‚Äì Will It Lead to a Bullish Reversal?
SUMMARY: XRP price started a downside correction below the $3.20 zone. The price is now attempting a recovery and might aim for a move above the $3.180 level. XRP price started a fresh pullback below the $3.20 zone. The price is now trading below $3.20 and the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average. There was a break above a bearish trend line with resistance at $3.120 on the hourly chart of the XRP/USD pair (data source from Kraken). The pair could start another increase if it stays above the $3.080 zone. XRP Price Eyes Fresh Increase XRP price started a fresh decline below the $3.30 zone, unlike Bitcoin and Ethereum . The price declined below the $3.250 and $3.220 support levels. The price dipped below the 50% Fib retracement level of the upward move from the $3.004 swing low to the $3.330 high. The bears even pushed the price below the $3.120 support zone. Finally, the bulls appeared near the $3.080 level. The price found support near the 76.4% Fib retracement level of the upward move from the $3.004 swing low to the $3.330 high. Recently, there was a break above a bearish trend line with resistance at $3.120 on the hourly chart of the XRP/USD pair. The price is now trading below $3.20 and the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average. On the upside, the price might face resistance near the $3.170 level. The first major resistance is near the $3.20 level. A clear move above the $3.20 resistance might send the price toward the $3.250 resistance. Any more gains might send the price toward the $3.330 resistance or even $3.350 in the near term. The next major hurdle for the bulls might be near the $3.40 zone. Another Drop? If XRP fails to clear the $3.20 resistance zone, it could start another decline. Initial support on the downside is near the $3.080 level. The next major support is near the $3.020 level. If there is a downside break and a close below the $3.020 level, the price might continue to decline toward the $3.00 support. The next major support sits near the $2.980 zone where the bulls might take a stand. Technical Indicators Hourly MACD ‚Äì The MACD for XRP/USD is now losing pace in the bearish zone. Hourly RSI (Relative Strength Index) ‚Äì The RSI for XRP/USD is now above the 50 level. Major Support Levels ‚Äì $3.080 and $3.020. Major Resistance Levels ‚Äì $3.170 and $3.20.

HEADLINE: SEC Opens Door to In-Kind Redemption Option for Crypto ETFs
SUMMARY: The US Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ) has cleared the way for crypto ETFs to use in-kind creations and redemptions, a move industry participants say could make the fast-growing market more efficient and cost-effective. The regulator voted on July 29 to approve orders allowing authorized participants to create and redeem shares of Bitcoin and Ether exchange-traded products (ETPs) in kind, meaning they can receive the underlying cryptocurrency directly rather than cash. Until now, spot Bitcoin and Ether ETPs approved in 2024 were restricted to cash-only transactions. Chairman Paul S. Atkins said following the vote: ‚ÄúA key priority of my chairmanship is developing a fit-for-purpose regulatory framework for crypto asset markets. Investors will benefit from these approvals, as they will make these products less costly and more efficient.‚Äù I''m pleased to share the SEC approved in-kind creations and redemptions for crypto ETPs. The approvals continue to build a rational regulatory framework for crypto, leading to a deeper and more dynamic market, which will benefit all American investors. https://t.co/UbQ9pXlBpD pic.twitter.com/DX8ub16Ey3 ‚Äî Paul Atkins (@SECPaulSAtkins) July 29, 2025 New Redemption Option to Boost Flexibility and Cut Costs The in-kind redemption model is common for traditional stock and commodity ETFs. In this system, authorized participants exchange shares for the underlying securities rather than cash. Now, applying the same mechanism to crypto ETPs, industry observers say, reduces friction. Additionally, it gives issuers and market makers greater flexibility when managing the funds. Move Lets Investors Defer Capital Gains Until Crypto Sale By allowing in-kind transfers, the SEC also gives institutional investors better tax efficiency. In a cash redemption, ETP issuers must sell the underlying cryptocurrency to raise funds, often triggering capital gains that are then passed on to shareholders. In-kind redemptions allow investors to receive the crypto directly and defer taxes until they decide to sell the assets. The Commission‚Äôs vote also advanced other initiatives to standardize the treatment of crypto-based products. It approved exchange applications to list and trade a mixed spot Bitcoin and Ether ETP, as well as options and Flexible Exchange (FLEX) options on certain spot Bitcoin products. Position limits for options on Bitcoin ETPs were increased to align with generic limits of up to 250,000 contracts. ETP Issuers Poised to Benefit as SEC Eases Operational Constraints Two scheduling orders were also issued to seek public comment on whether national securities exchanges should be allowed to list and trade two large-cap crypto ETPs. These products had been approved earlier by the Division of Trading and Markets under delegated authority. The decision marks a departure from the more restrictive framework adopted for crypto ETFs last year. In addition, analysts said the shift brings the sector closer to how mainstream ETFs operate. As a result, it could lead to tighter spreads and better liquidity. Moreover, it may attract new institutional investors who had been cautious about the operational constraints of cash-only redemptions. Crypto ETF assets have grown rapidly since spot Bitcoin ETFs debuted in early 2024, amassing tens of billions in assets under management. The SEC‚Äôs latest orders could accelerate that growth as issuers adapt to the new framework. The post SEC Opens Door to In-Kind Redemption Option for Crypto ETFs appeared first on Cryptonews .
